loans.name: Levon

texts.en:
Levon was born in 1956 in Ijevan city. He is married and has three children: two sons and a daughter. Levon's children are married. One son and daughter live separately from their parents and another son and his family live with Levon. 
 
Levon worked as a mechanic for a long time, but since 1994, he has been engaged in bee keeping. Now Levon has 10 beehives and he intends to add to his beehives, which will help him to increase his family's income in the future. Levon sells derived honey to his regular customers.
 
Recently Levon has laid out a garden where he grows nuts and fruits. He says when his trees grow enough he will be able to sell nuts and fruits and to gain additional means for his family. 

Levon is seeking a 1,000,000 AMD loan to buy 10 beehives and to fence his garden. 

This is Levon's fifth loan from Nor Horizon and he has never delayed his repayments.

loans.use: To buy 10 beehives and to fence his garden

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en: Virginia is 36 years old. She is single and does not have any children yet. She operates a beauty salon in which she braids, weaves and treats ladies hair. Her business is located in a busy area known as Bombolulu in Mombasa. She has been in this business for seven years now and says that though the business is profitable, she has challenges of financial constraints. She is using her loan of KES 20,000 to buy more hair weaves, braids and treatments to grow her business and meet the demands of her customers. In the future, she hopes to expand her business and provide employment to the local people. She describes herself as cheerful and outgoing.

loans.use: to buy braids, hair weaves and hair treatments

loans.name: Mehriniso

texts.ru: Мехринисо проживает в районе Дангара. Ей 46 лет. Она замужем. У нее четверо детей. Ее старший сын работает, а трое других учатся в школе. Сама Мехринисо представляет услугу. Она у себя дома занимается шитьем. Она шьет национальные платья. Этим видом деятельности занимается три года. Кредит берет для приобретения тканей, чтобы сшить платья для продажи.
texts.en: Mehriniso lives in the Dangara district.  She is 46 years old, married and has four children.  Her oldest son works, and the three others attend school.  Mehriniso provides a service of sewing national dresses at home.  She has been involved in this business for three years.  She is requesting this loan for the purchase of fabrics in order to sew dresses for sale.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics

loans.name: Duk

texts.en:
Mr. Duk, 48, is married to Mrs. Sy, 52, who is a local farmer in Kompong Speu Province. They spend most of their life time planting crops on their own farmland. They have five single children, two of whom are employed as workers in manufacturers. The couple makes a profit of about $5USD a day from their farming business. Mr. Duk would like to borrow some funds from Kiva in order to build a new kitchen room.   

In the future, Mr. Duk would like to enlarge his crop-planting business and to construct a new house which is bigger than the present one. In addition, he will send his children to study up to at least finishing high school level.

loans.use: to build a new kitchen room.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase piglets, feed.

loans.name: Gloria Group

texts.en:
Gloria is married with 8 children. She is 60 years old and lives in Cogon, Osamiz City.
To earn a living, Gloria is a massage therapist. She has had this job for 10 years. Each month, she earns approximately PHP 3,000. She has requested a loan of PHP 7,000 to purchase lumber for her house renovation.  Gloria has been a member of PMPC for 1 year.
In the future, Gloria wants to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase lumber for her house renovation.

loans.name: Rayya

texts.en: Rayya is a 52-year-old woman. She is married and has 10 sons and 8 daughters. Her husband is sometimes employed and Rayya has her own project, which is selling fruits and vegetables, So Rayya's work is mainly the only source of income for the family. Rayya needs to increase her sales in the feast season by purchasing big amounts of fruits and vegetables to sell and increase her income, especially now that the feast is around the corner. Rayya has an amount of money that isn't enough to pay, so she needs to take a loan of $1,000 from FATEN. When Rayya gets the FATEN loan, which is repaid on a monthly basis, she will be able to purchase more fruits and vegetables and increase her income so her family will have better life conditions. Rayya is photographed in the place where she is selling fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: To purchase fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Margie Llegunas Group

texts.en:
Margie is married. She is now 44 years old. With 8 children, she lives in Camanga, Tukuran, ZDS.

Margie is a farmer and grows PALAY(rice) to earn a living, but she also plants vegetables as another source of income. She's been doing this for 13 years. 

She has requested a loan for 4,500 to purchase fertilizer for her farm. Margie has been a member of PMPC for more than 4 years. In the future, Margie hopes to have her own farm land. Margie in the leader of 3 person group. Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer.

loans.name: Zein

texts.en:
Zein is a 33-year-old married man and father of two children. He works hard to fulfill their needs and make all their desires come true. Zein is a hard working man. He has worked in agriculture since his first day of working, but to increase and improve his family's income and social situation, he bought in 2005 a small van, which he used to start a new business transporting students from the region to/from school.

His business is improving because of the trust the parents have in him. He is a good driver and the safety of the kids is the main thing he cares about.
His car is new and in a good situation. Sometimes he uses it to take tourists all over the Lebanese borders upon tourists' requests, and most of these tours happen in the summer when there are no students to be committed to.

Zein is requesting a loan from Al Majmoua-Kiva partner, in order to pay what's left from the bus's price. He hopes to expand his business more and more in the future by increasing the number of buses he owns.

loans.use: To pay off his bus

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is married and has 7 children. Teresita is 47 years old and lives in Bañadero, Ozamiz City.

To earn a living, Teresita has a buying and selling business such as scrap metals, plastic and bottles. She has had this business for 1 year. Each month, she earns approximately PHP 3,000 a month. She has a requested a loan of PHP 14,999 to purchase a second hand tricycle. Teresita has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, Teresita hopes to be successful in her chosen business.

loans.use: to purchase second hand tricycle.

loans.name: Ulanoi

texts.ru:
Уланой замужем и любящая мать 6 детей. Она умная и добрая женщина. Её муж уехал в Россию, чтобы зарабатывать денег и Уланой начала свой бизнес, чтобы помогать мужу для содержания семьи. Уланой выращивает морковь, картошки и капусту. Она хочет, получит максимальную прибыль и устроит своих детей в школу. Ей необходимо покупать горюче смазочные материалы и минеральных удобрений для переработки земли и семена для посева, чтобы получить хороший урожай в предстоящий сезон. С этой целью она запрашивает займ в размере 1800$ США. Она надеется, что кредиторы будут поддерживать её. 


More about Tajikistan and IMON International

Tajikistan is known for its rich history, which includes a key post along the Silk Road and the end of Alexander the Great's rule. It has also produced great thinkers, philosophers, scientists and poets, including Rudaki, Avicenna, Ferdowsi, Omar Khayyam, Jomi, and Rumi. The country is home to communities that still speak the ancient Sogdian language, epic mountain passes, and a civilization that dates back to the 4th millennium BC. And, even today, it is a complex mixture of the Islamic faith, Soviet culture, New West culture and Central Asian traditions.

But Tajikistan is also the poorest of the former Soviet republics. The civil war, which ignited soon after its independence from the U.S.S.R., further damaged the already weak economy. In addition, 93% of the country is mountainous and only 7% of the land is arable. These conditions have resulted in high levels of unemployment and have forced hundreds of thousands to seek work in other countries, mainly Russia. While the people of Tajikistan are working to improve its agricultural production and manufacturing sector, nearly two-thirds of the population still live in abject poverty.

IMON's History

Since December 2007, IMON International has worked closely with Kiva and Kiva lenders to ensure that poor and low income clients represent a viable business proposition. Funds raised through Kiva have already been distributed to thousands of IMON International's clients and will continue to provide thousands more with permanent access to the varied financial services they need. To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit: www.imon.tj
texts.en: Ulanoi is married and is a loving mother of six children.  She is a smart and kind woman.  Her husband left to go to Russia in order to earn money, and Ulanoi started her own business, so that she could help her husband to support the family.  Ulanoi grows carrots, potatoes and cabbage.  She wants to maximize her profits and place her children into a school.  She needs to buy lubricants and mineral fertilizers to recondition the land, and seeds for sowing, in order to receive a good harvest in the upcoming season.  This is why she is requesting a loan in the sum of $1800.  She hopes that creditors will support her.

loans.use: to purchase lubricants, seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Deselyn

texts.en:
Deselyn is 42 years old and lives in Zamora Aloran, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has 6 children. 

To earn a living, Deselyn has a business selling rice, vegetable oil, noodles, sugar, milk, softdrinks and canned goods. She earns about PHP 2,000 each month doing this type of work. Deselyn has a requested a loan of 12,000 to purchase more stocks for her general store. Deselyn has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, Deselyn hopes to have a grocery store in Aloran.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks for her grocery store.

loans.name: Arzikan's Group

texts.en:
Arzikan is the treasurer of this group. She is 46 and unfortunately, she is a widow. She has two sons and four daughters. Two younger daughters live with their mom and the other children went to work in Russia.  In order to earn additional money for her livelihood, Arzikan cultivates agricultural products. She grows sunflowers, corn and rice. Selling some part of the harvest, she earns about 3,000 soms per month. Arzikan applied for the loan because she needs money to purchase a door and window frames to repair her house. In the future, she wants to see that all her children are married.

--- Where Did This Loan Come From? ---

This loan is brought to you by Mol Bulak Finance (MBF), a young, ambitious and socially-focused Microfinance Institution in Kyrgyzstan. 
MBF is strongly committed to the principles of sustainable development and upholds the triple bottom line – People (building human capital and taking care of its customers as well as society), Planet (keeping environmentally friendly) and Profit (earning revenue to expand autonomously). MBF is the only Microfinance Institute in Kyrgyzstan that delivers its services to customers 365 days a year. To learn more about MBF and view a Video presentation about the organization, please visit: http://www.kiva.org/about/aboutPartner?id=135 
If you would like to support and learn more about Kyrgyzstan and microfinance in Central Asia, please join our Lending Team - Supporters of Kyrgyzstan – Mol Bulak Finance at http://kiva.org/team/kyrgyzstan. Members will get special updates and news from Kiva Fellows in Kyrgyzstan and from the MBF staff.

loans.use: to purchase a door and window frames

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is 45 years old and lives in San Vicente Bajo, Oroquieta City. He is married with one child.

To earn a living, James has a business selling items such as rice, corn, canned goods, soft drinks, noodles, vegetable oil, toyo (soy sauce), cigarettes etc. He earns about PHP 1,500 each month doing this type of work. James has requested a loan of PHP 7,000 to purchase stocks for his grocery store. James has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, James would like to have a big grocery store.

loans.use: to purchase stock for his grocery store

loans.name: Solihamo

texts.ru: Солихамо проживает в районе Дангары. Ей 22 года. Она замужем. Имеет одного ребенка. Ее ребенок является инвалидом. Солихамо уже шесть лет как занимается торговлей. Она начала свой бизнес с торговли лепешек. Сейчас у нее имеется торговая точка, где она занимается торговлей детской и женской одежды. Кредит берет для приобретения костюмчиков, носков и покупки детской обуви.
texts.en: Solihamo lives in the Dangara district.  She is 22 years old, married and has one child.  Her child is disabled.  Solihamo has been involved in sales for six years.  She started her own business with the sales of flatbread.  Currently, she has a retail outlet, where she sells children's and women's clothing.  She is requesting this loan for the purchase of suits, socks and children's shoes.

loans.use: to purchase suits, socks and children's shoes

loans.name: Meriam

texts.en:
Meriam is 43 years old and lives in Zamora, Aloran, Misamis Occidental. She is married with three children. 

To earn a living, Meriam has a business selling different kinds of viands. She earns about PHP 3,000 each month doing this type of work. Meriam has requested a loan to purchase raw ingredients for her viand vending.

Meriam has been a member of PMPC for three years.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients for her viand vending

loans.name: Ledesma

texts.en:
Ledesma is a responsible housewife who aims to become successful in the future. She is 43 years old and has four school-age children. They want them to finish their studies so that they will find a good job someday. Rice farming is their main source of income. They have been in this business for almost 28 years now and usually earn a profit of only PHP 20,000 per cropping. 

She aims to increase their production so that they will increase their income for their basic necessities and for the schooling of their children. She wants to ask for a loan of PHP 25,000 to buy fertilizers and pesticides and to pay expenses incurred in transplanting the rice seedlings. She mentioned that she needs to work hard and strive harder to achieve her goals.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides and to pay expenses incurred in transplanting the rice

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.en:
Mercedes is married with four children. Mercedes is 48 years old and lives in ZNAC, Tampilisan, Zamboanga del Norte.

Mercedes sells barbecued and dried fish to earn a living and has had this business for 10 years. She has requested a loan of 40,000 to purchase 10 boxes of dried fish to sell as another business.

Mercedes has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Mercedes hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase 10 boxes of dried fish to sell as another business

loans.name: Chea

texts.en:
Mrs. Chea, is a 31-year-old married woman and a local villager living in a medium-sized home with her three children and her parent in Siem Reap Province. Mrs. Chea married, but she is divorced from her husband.

Mrs. Chea works in the massage shop as an internal staff and she can get around $4USD each day. She has a plan for running a small business as a clothes seller. Now Mrs. Chea has some money in her savings account but it is not sufficient to make her plan possible. Therefore, Mrs. Chea has applied for a $800 loan from Kiva’s partner HKL in order to purchase different kinds of clothes for selling.

For her future expectation, Mrs. Chea wants to expand her clothes-selling business, to build a new room in her house and to support her children to attain the university degree.

loans.use: to purchase different kinds of clothes for selling.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase fruits and vegetables in bulk to increase her sales for an upcoming feast.

loans.name: Phy

texts.en: Mrs. Phy is 25 years old. She is living with her old mother. She now generates her income by selling vermicelli in one market near her commune. From this business, she earns about $4 per day. Taking time from this business, she also works as a pig raiser. She would like to expand on her raising pig business but the lack of money to buy feed has led her to request some funds through HKL partner, with Kiva, with the purpose of purchasiong feed. She said that this loan is very useful for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed.

loans.name: Abbass

texts.en:
Abbass is a 64-year-old married man and father of one child. He has been working with cattle for the last 40 years. 

Abbass is a hard worker, he has spent most of his life raising his cattle in a very good area, to ensure they have the best quality that could be requested. 

Abbass works hard on improving his family's way of living and eating. He is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua to fix all his irrigation equipment and to buy cattle food to store for the winter, because the price is very affordable right now. 

Abbass has been Al Majmoua borrower for two loan cycles, the previous loan had a very good impact on his business and life. He hopes this loan will help more in improving everything he needs.

loans.use: To fix an irrigation system and increase cattle feed storage

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes, a business-lady at Mariakani in Mombasa operates a fruits and vegetables sales business. She has been in this business for twenty years and says that it is profitable as it feeds her five children. She says that though the business is profitable she has had challenges of competition so customers are not loyal as they are spoiled for choice. 

She is using her loan of 50,000 Kenyan Shillings (KES) to buy more fruits and vegetables to grow her business and meet the demands of her customers. In the future she hopes to grow her business to wholesale and open another grocery store. She describes herself as sincere and a good leader.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Naseem's Group

texts.en:
Naseem has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further improvement of her clothes-selling business. She will buy clothes in bulk from a wholesale market to be able to offer more variety to her clients and increase her chances of making more sales and profits. 

She is 35 years old, married and a mother of six children: three of them study while others stay at home. Her husband is a driver by profession. 

Naseem is also a very good housewife, she performs her household duties very well along with her business. 

She is very confident that she will successfully be able to improve her business condition after investing the loan into it. 

Note: In the photo, the lady raising her hand is Naseem.

loans.use: To buy clothes for selling

loans.name: Lila

texts.es: Lila, D. 61 años esta casada y goza D. la compañía D. su esposo y sus cinco hijos, con quienes vive en su casa propia.El trabajo D. Lila consiste en hacer pedidos al por mayor D. bebidas gaseosas, para después venderlos entre sus vecinos y algunos ocasionales clientes que pasan por su casa. Lila lleva ya dos años en este negocio, realiza esta actividad junto a sus hijos quienes por el momento trabajan D. manera temporal.Lo que más le gusta D. su trabajo es que pueD. disponer D. su tiempo, además, lo que no le gusta es que a veces tiene que estar agachándose mucho para buscar las gaseosas dentro D. su refrigeradora para vender. Lila espera más adelante poder hacer crecer su negocio ya que considera que le genera muy buenas ganancias.Este es el préstamo numero 16 entre Lila y la institución MFP, le gusta mucho el grupo que forma parte ya que son muy responsables, esta muy agradecida D. la institución por que gracias a los prestamos obtenidos pudo realizar muchas mejor en su hogar.Con el monto solicitado 3000 soles, ella comprara mas bebidas para poder seguir en el negocio, y espera poder hacer alcanzar para comprar una refrigeradora también.
texts.en: Lila, age 61, is married and enjoys the company of her husband and their five children, with whom she lives in their own house.  Lila's work consists of ordering wholesale soft drinks, and then reselling them to her neighbors and some occasional customers who pass by her house.  Lila has worked two years in this business, together with her children who for the moment work at seasonal jobs.  What she enjoys most about her work is that she can manage her time; however, what she doesn't like is that sometimes she has to bend down often to look for the soft drinks insiD. the refrigerator in order to sell them.  In the future, Lila hopes to be able to make her business grow, since she considers that it generates very good profits.  This is the 16th loan between Lila and the MFP organization.  She really likes the group that she is a part of since they are very responsable and she is grateful to the organization because thanks to the loans she has received, she was able to make many improvements to her home.  With the amount of 3,000 soles requested, she will purchase more beverages so that she can continue her business, and hopefully, have enough to buy a refrigerator as well.

loans.use: to purchase more beverages so that she can continue her business, and hopefully, have enough to buy a refrigerator as well.

loans.name: Hiek

texts.en:
There are many Cambodians who make a living as planter. One of them is Mrs. Hiek, 32, who has been working in this sector since 1999. Presently, Hiek grows maize and potatoes on her own farmland, which she inherited from her grandparents. From this business, she can generate an income of around US$ 2 per day. She is married to Sokhan, age 36. This humble couple has two children who depend on them. Both of their children are in school. 

This growing-maize and potatoes season, the family planted one month ago but their maize is not growing well due to the lack of fertilizer. Because of this condition, Hiek and her husband would like to request a loan from Kiva in order to purchase fertilizer to improve her business. She says the income will help her improve her family's living standards. She is grateful to all lenders that help her family. She is shown with her husband.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase more goats to resell and molasses to make more local gin.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.fr:
Béatrice est née au Rwanda et a 37 ans. Elle est mariée et elle a 3 enfants de 4 à 13 ans, dont 2 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est 6 ans de primaire. 

C’est son deuxième cycle de prêt avec ACB. Béatrice a un commerce de boutique et elle a deux maisons de locations. Elle va utiliser son crédit pour acheter des parcelles pour construire. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de bien rembourser son crédit provenant des maisons de locations pour qu’elle puisse demander un autre crédit afin de construire une maison de location sur les nouvelles parcelles. 
Dans les prochaines années, Béatrice voudrait se développer de plus. Avec les profits, elle prévoit de payer les frais scolaires de ses enfants et de développer la famille.
texts.en:
Béatrice was born in Rwanda and is 37 years old. She is married and has three children from four to thirteen years old, two of whom are at school. She has six years of primary education.

This is her second loan from ACB. Béatrice has a shop business and two houses she rents out. She is going to use her loan to buy land lots for construction. 

Her business growth plan is to repay her loan correctly from the rental income from her houses so that she can ask for another loan in order to build a house for rental on the new land. In the coming years Béatrice would like to develop her activities more. With her profits she is planning to pay her children's school fees and expand her family.

loans.use: to buy land lots for construction

loans.name: Omar

texts.en:
Omar is a 29, married, and has two sons. He works in agriculture also has a project of raising sheep and selling their products. Omar wants to expand in his project by purchasing more sheep in order to benefit from selling its products to increase income. 

Omar hasn't enough money to pay, so he needs to take a loan from FATEN for $1,000. When Omar takes this FATEN loan, which is repaid on a monthly basis, he will purchase more sheep and expand his project to increase the family's income to have a better standard of living. Omar is photographed in the place where he is raising sheep.

loans.use: To purchase more sheep in order to expand his project and increase the family's income.

loans.name: Dolibe

texts.es: Dolibe tiene 59 años  es mujer casa casada, fruto D. su matrimonio es madre D. cuatro hijos quienes ya son mayores y tienen familia. Ella vive junto a su esposo y una hija en su casa propia que pudieron comprar con esfuerzo.El trabajo D. Dolibe consiste en la venta D. bebidas, además ella tiene otras actividades, venD. queso, comida y panes, este último no pueD. hacer por el momento ya que el horno que tiene en su casa sufrió algunos desperfectos y esta en espera D. ser reparado. Ella realiza este trabajo en su casa y lo hace sola ya que su esposo y su hija trabajan fuera, lleva dos años realizando este trabajo que le permitió tener tiempo y un ingreso extra a la economía D. su hogar.Le gusta D. su trabajo que tiene tiempo a su disposición, además por la alta temperatura siempre hay clientes en busca D. bebidas gaseosas heladas. A Dolibe le gustaría mucho mas adelante poder hacer crecer su negocio además D. poder reconstruir su horno para que siga generando más ingresos a su economía.Este es el préstamo dieciséis entre la institución MFP y Dolibe, espera poder seguir trabajando con MFP ya que le agrada mucho que le den la confianza D. poder salir adelante por si misma, además D. los intereses son uy bajos y le permite poder trabajar sin tener que endeudarse demasiado.Con el dinero solicitado 2000 soles, ella comprará más bebidas gaseosas que requiere para seguir con su negocio.
texts.en: Dolibe is 59. She is a married mother of four grown children who have their own families. She lives with her husband and one daughter in her own home which they worked hard to be able to buy. Dolibe sells drinks. She also has other businesses; she sells cheese, food and bread. She cannot sell bread at the moment because her oven is in need of repair. She works from home, alone, since her husband and daughter work outsiD. of the  home. She has done this work for two years, and it has allowed her to have time and an extra income for her home. She likes that her business allows her to have time to herself. Because of the heat, she always has customers looking for pop and ice cream. Dolibe would really like to expand her business in the future, as well as to be able to fix her oven so that she can continue making more income. This is her sixteenth loan from MFP. She hopes to be able to continue working with MFP, and she is very grateful that they give her the confidence to be able to get herself ahead. The interest rates are very low and allow her to continue working without having to get too far in debt. With the 2000 requested soles, she will purchase more pop, which she needs in order to continue with her business.

loans.use: to purchase more pop for her business.

loans.name: Zarrinakhon

texts.ru:
Зарринахон умная, добрая и молодая мамочка. У неё один ребёнок и они с мужем ждут пополнения в семье. Она с мужем занимается купля продажей мебели и бытовой техники. Данный бизнес является наследственным бизнесом. Раньше её родители занимались этим, и более 2 лет она продолжает данный бизнес. Она продаёт широкий выбор ассортимент мебели, такие как диваны, кресла, спальные и кухонные гарнитуры. Зарринахон хотела бы получит займ в размере 3000$ США для покупки мебели с целью пополнения оборотного капитала. Она заранее благодарит всех кредиторов за поддержку и поощрение.   

More about Tajikistan and IMON International

Tajikistan is known for its rich history, which includes a key post along the Silk Road and the end of Alexander the Great's rule. It has also produced great thinkers, philosophers, scientists and poets, including Rudaki, Avicenna, Ferdowsi, Omar Khayyam, Jomi, and Rumi. The country is home to communities that still speak the ancient Sogdian language, epic mountain passes, and a civilization that dates back to the 4th millennium BC. And, even today, it is a complex mixture of the Islamic faith, Soviet culture, New West culture and Central Asian traditions.

But Tajikistan is also the poorest of the former Soviet republics. The civil war, which ignited soon after its independence from the U.S.S.R., further damaged the already weak economy. In addition, 93% of the country is mountainous and only 7% of the land is arable. These conditions have resulted in high levels of unemployment and have forced hundreds of thousands to seek work in other countries, mainly Russia. While the people of Tajikistan are working to improve its agricultural production and manufacturing sector, nearly two-thirds of the population still live in abject poverty.

IMON's History

Since December 2007, IMON International has worked closely with Kiva and Kiva lenders to ensure that poor and low income clients represent a viable business proposition. Funds raised through Kiva have already been distributed to thousands of IMON International's clients and will continue to provide thousands more with permanent access to the varied financial services they need. To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit: www.imon.tj
texts.en: Zarrinakhon is a smart, kind and young mother.  She has one child, and husband and she are expecting an addition to the family.  Together with her husband, Zarrinakhon is involved in buying and selling furniture and household electronics.  This is an inherited business.  Previously, her parents were running this business, and Zarrinakhon took over this business over two years ago.  She sells a wide variety of furniture, such as couches, armchairs, bedroom and kitchen sets.  Zarrinakhon wants to obtain a loan in the sum of $3000 for the purchase of furniture in order to increase goods turnover.  She thanks all creditors in advance for the help and support.

loans.use: to purchase furniture and increase goods turnover

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is a 35-year-old single lady. She has no children yet. She operates a tailoring service business at the busy Bombolulu area in Mombasa. She has been in this business for five years.

She says the business is profitable and the major challenge she has is financial constraints. However, she works hard from early morning to late evening to keep her business doing well. She is using her loan of 20,000 KES to buy materials for making clothes to sell to her customers. She plans to get an employee and in future she plans to open another tailoring service business. She describes herself as outgoing and cheerful.

loans.use: to buy materials

loans.name: Chinigul

texts.ru: Чинигул проживает в районе Дангара. Ей 41 год. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее дети маленькие. Чинигул имеет среднее образование. Она у себя в районе открыла магазин. У нее магазин со смешанным ассортиментом. В этой области она уже четыре года. Кредит берет для покупки продуктов питания и хозяйственных товаров.
texts.en: Chinigul lives in the Dangara district.  She is 41 years old, married and has three children, all of whom are small.  Chinigul has a secondary education.  She opened a store in her district and carries various merchandise in her store.  She has been working in this field for four years.  Chinigul is requesting this loan for the purchase of food products and household goods.

loans.use: to purchase food products and household goods

loans.name: Chan

texts.en: Mrs. Chan, age 33, is married to Chheam, age 34. This humble couple has two children who are living under their income. Chan and her husband have been spending their lives cultivating crops, since 1990. This is a skill they had learned from their grandparents when they were young. From this business, they earn about $2 per day. According to the rainy season and the lack of money, Chan and her husband would like to request some funds through HKL, partnered with Kiva. They will use the funds to purchase seeds and fertilizer for supporting their business. This is the third cycle that she has borrowed from HKL partner and the first cycle she is borrowing from Kiva. She said that this loan is very useful for her life and family.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy groceries and drinks so she can keep doing her work.

loans.name: Irina

texts.en:
Irina was born in 1981. She lives in Getahovit village, Ijevan region. Irina is married and has two school-aged children and a newborn daughter.

Since 2001, Irina's family has been engaged in beekeeping, animal husbandry and gardening, the income from which helps them to keep their family. Also with the farming income they bought a car which they use to move their farm animals to the mountains.

On their farm Irina and her family have bee families, some cows, chickens and turkeys. They also have a beautiful garden where they grow fruits. Irina sells honey to her regular costumers and the other agricultural produce she uses for her family's needs. Often Irina and her husband buy calves, move them to the mountains in summer months and sell them in autumn.

This is Irina's second Kiva loan and now she is asking for a 1,000,000 AMD loan to buy fodder (feed) for her farm animals and to repair her beehives.

loans.use: to buy fodder for her farm animals and to repair her beehives

loans.name: Katcha's Group

texts.en: Katcha is the leader of this group. She is 54 and married to a farmer. Together with her husband, she has raised two daughters and five sons. The youngest son is at school, two sons went to work in Russia and the other children are married and live separately with their families. The family is engaged in cattle breeding. In order to earn additional money for their livelihood, Katcha sells dairy products. Her husband breeds cattle and then resells them at a higher price after being fattened. With money received from the loan, Katcha wants to purchase more farm animals in order to expand their family business. In the future, with the profits gained from this activity, she wants to purchase construction materials for building a house for their son. ====================================== --- Where Did This Loan Come From? --- This loan is brought to you by Mol Bulak Finance, a young and ambitious socially-focused MFI in Kyrgyzstan. Mol Bulak Finance is strongly committed to the principles of sustainable development on the basis of the 3-Ps concept - People (building human capital and taking care of its customers and the society as well), Profit (to be profitable in order to grow further) and the Planet (taking care of the environment). It is also the only MFI in Kyrgyzstan that delivers its services to customers 365 days a year. To learn more about Mol Bulak and view a Video presentation about the organization, please visit: www.kiva.org/about/aboutPartner?id=135. If you would like to support and learn more about Kyrgyzstan and micro-finance in Central Asia, please join our Lending Team - Supporters of Kyrgyzstan - at www.kiva.org/team/kyrgyzstan. Members will get special updates and news from the Kiva Fellows in Kyrgyzstan and from Mol Bulak staff.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Cherif Sidy

texts.fr: Cherif sidy est un client depuis le 08/06/2011 ,jeune homme de 24ans, celibatair ,il habite avec sa famille dans une grande ville au sud du senegal. Chauffeur depuis 3ans avec son taxi qui est tombe en panne depuis deux mois.Apres il a decidé de fair une demande de crédit au niveau de uimcec pour réparer son taxi et reprendre ses activités de transports.Avec son bénéfice il veut épargner pour éventuellement acheter un autre taxi.
texts.en: Cherif Sidy has been a client since June 8, 2011. He is a young man, 24 years old, and unmarried living in a large city in southern Senegal. He has been a driver for three years with his taxi, which has been out of service for two months. Since then, he decided to take out a loan with the micro-finance institution UIMCEC to repair his taxi and return to his work in transport. With his profits, he wants to save money perhaps to buy another taxi.

loans.use: to buy a motor for his taxi

loans.name: Enoch

texts.en:
Enoch is 25 years old and lives in the town of Luwero in the Gulu region of Uganda.  He is married and has one child.  His child is not currently in school.  Enoch has a small retail shop business, which he has had for 4 years.         

To help expand his business, Enoch has requested a loan of 1,500,000 Ugandan shillings from BRAC Uganda.  The loan will be used to purchase essential commodities like sugar and soap for resale.  With the help of the loan from BRAC, Enoch hopes to generate greater profits and buy food for his family.

In the future, Enoch hopes to expand his business.  Enoch is a member of BRAC’s small enterprise program, which has helped his prospects for the future by improving his business.

loans.use: to purchase essential commodities like sugar and soap for resale

loans.name: Jessica

texts.es: Jessica, de 31 años, es una mujer soltera con muchas ganas de sobresalir. Vive en la casa de sus padres junto a su hija y sus dos hermanos.Para Jessica el negocio de la venta de frutas es una actividad que le ha ayudado a obtener los ingresos necesarios para poder solventar las necesidades de su familia. Este negocio lo viene realizando con su hermana desde hace más de 10 años. Su hermana aun es menor y depende de ella ya que su madre falleció y su padre se despreocupo de ella desde muy niña.Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene tiempo para poder realizar algunas otras actividades, lo  que no le gusta es a veces tener que salir temprano al mercado para poder realizar las compras de sus productos, ella espera poder mas adelante retomar el trabajo de ventas de frutas para que así pueda continuar con la educación de su hermana e intentar mejorar su calidad de vida.Este es el séptimo ciclo este Jessica y la institución MFP, se lleva bien con todos los del grupo y es muy querida ya que siempre se mostró como una socia muy responsable y puntual.Con el préstamo solicitado, ella comprará frutas para poder seguir con su negocio.
texts.en:
Jessica, 31 years old, is a single woman with a great desire to excel. She lives in her parents' house with her daughter and her two siblings.

For Jessica, the fruit-selling business is something that has helped her earn the necessary income to meet the family's needs. She has been working in this business with her sister for more than ten years. Her sister is younger than Jessica and depends on her since their mother passed away and their father has neglected her since she was a young child.

What Jessica likes best about her work is that she has time for some other activities. What she doesn't like is that sometimes she has to leave early for the market to buy her products. She hopes to take up the fruit sales work again so she can continue paying for her sister's education and try to improve their quality of life.

This is Jessica's seventh loan cycle with MFP. She gets along well with all the group members and is well-liked because she has always shown herself to be a very responsible and punctual member. She will buy fruits with the loan she has requested so that she can continue with her business.

loans.use: to buy fruits so she can continue with her business.

loans.name: Makhsudjon

texts.ru:
Махсуджон женат и любящий отец 6 детей. Он умный, добрый и целеустремленный человек. Более 12 лет он занимается скотоводством, а также занимается кормлением курицы и индюка, когда они вырастут, он продает их в хороших ценах. Так как у Махсуджона большая семья ему нужен хороший доход, чтобы обеспечить своих детей. С этой целью он хочет расширить свой бизнес и максимизировать прибыль. Он хотел бы получить займ в размере 2000$ США для покупки скота и пополнение оборотного капитала. Махсуджон хочет заранее благодарит всех за помощь и поддержку.  

More about Tajikistan and IMON International

Tajikistan is known for its rich history, which includes a key post along the Silk Road and the end of Alexander the Great's rule. It has also produced great thinkers, philosophers, scientists and poets, including Rudaki, Avicenna, Ferdowsi, Omar Khayyam, Jomi, and Rumi. The country is home to communities that still speak the ancient Sogdian language, epic mountain passes, and a civilization that dates back to the 4th millennium BC. And, even today, it is a complex mixture of the Islamic faith, Soviet culture, New West culture and Central Asian traditions.

But Tajikistan is also the poorest of the former Soviet republics. The civil war, which ignited soon after its independence from the U.S.S.R., further damaged the already weak economy. In addition, 93% of the country is mountainous and only 7% of the land is arable. These conditions have resulted in high levels of unemployment and have forced hundreds of thousands to seek work in other countries, mainly Russia. While the people of Tajikistan are working to improve its agricultural production and manufacturing sector, nearly two-thirds of the population still live in abject poverty.

IMON's History

Since December 2007, IMON International has worked closely with Kiva and Kiva lenders to ensure that poor and low income clients represent a viable business proposition. Funds raised through Kiva have already been distributed to thousands of IMON International's clients and will continue to provide thousands more with permanent access to the varied financial services they need. To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit: www.imon.tj
texts.en: Makhsudjon is married and is a loving father of six children.  He is a smart, kind and goal-oriented person.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for over twelve years and is also involved in raising chickens and turkeys, which he will sell at good prices once they are grown.  Because Makhsudjon has a large family, he needs a good income in order to provide for his children.  To achieve this goal, he wants to expand his business and maximize his profits.  He wants to obtain a loan in the sum of $2000 for the purchase of livestock and increase of turnover.  Makhsudjon wants to thank everyone in advance for the help and support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase flour and meat wholesale for production

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es: Luisa, de 34 años, es madre soltera, vive con su hijo a quien educa, su hermana y su cuñado en una casa que quedo como herencia de sus padres.Luisa consiste se levanta muy temprano para poder comprar algunos materiales e insumos para su trabajo Ella se dedica a la venta de refrescos en el puerto del reloj público (puerto embarcadero fluvial de la ciudad) . En esta actividad lleva ya 4 años; ahora Luisa tiene en mente poder incursionar a un nuevo negocio que esta segura dará resultados, piensa empezar a comprar sandias para su venta en la ciudad, esta actividad la realiza sola.Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que todos los días hay ingresos y con eso hay para el alimento diario, lo que no le gusta es que algunas personas al verla sola se van a molestarla ya que piensan que por estar sola pueden ponerse faltoso, pero ella esta ahí para ponerlos en su lugar.A Luisa le gustaría poder iniciar también un negocio en su casa el de un restaurante para así estar más cerda de su familia y pueda sentirse mas tranquila.Este es el tercer préstamo entre MFP y Luisa, esta contenta con su grupo pero espera que sean un poco más responsables ya que de eso depende el futuro de muchos socios.Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprar insumos e ingredientes para preparar sus refrescos.
texts.en:
Luisa is 34 years old and a single mother. She lives with the son she is raising, her sister and her brother-in-law in a house that was left as an inheritance from her parents.

Luisa wakes up very early so she can buy some materials and supplies for her work. She sells refreshments at the Clock Tower port (the city's river port). She has done this work for four years. Now Luisa is thinking about beginning a new business that she is sure will have good results; she is thinking about buying watermelons to sell in the city, and she will do this work alone.

What she likes about her work is that she has income everyday, and with this she can buy the day's food. What she doesn't like is that some people, when seeing her alone, come to bother her. They think they can be disrespectful because she's alone, but she puts them in their place.

Luisa would also like to start a restaurant in her house so she can be closer to her family and feel calmer. This is her third loan with MFP, and Luisa is happy with her group but hopes that they become a little more responsible since the future of many members depends on this. With the 1000 soles she asked for, she will buy supplies and ingredients for preparing her refreshments.

loans.use: to buy supplies and ingredients for making her refreshments.

loans.name: Straton

texts.fr:
Straton est né au Rwanda et a 29 ans. Il est marié avec 2 enfants de 3 et 5 ans, dont 1 scolarisé. Il a aussi 5 orphelins en charge. Il a fait 6 ans des études primaires. 

Straton est commerçant. C’est son deuxième cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit pour renforcer son business de boutique en achetant d’autres marchandises. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d’accueillir biens les clients et satisfaire les  besoins des clients avec les services de qualité  .Dans les prochaines années, Straton voudrait élargir son business et être un grand commerçant connue dans sa région. Avec les profits il voudrait épargner beaucoup plus pour les études des ses enfants.
texts.en:
Straton was born in Rwanda and is 29 years old. He is married and has 2 children, 3 and 5 years old, one of whom attends school. He has six years of primary schooling. 

Straton is a merchant. This local cycle is his second one with ACB. He is going to use his loan to bolster business in his shop by buying more merchandise.  

His strategy for business growth is to do well in accommodating his customers and satisfying their needs with quality service. In the next few years, Straton would like to enlarge his business and to be a recognized major merchant in his region. With the profits, he would like to save a lot more money for his children's schooling.

loans.use: to bolster his shop business by buying more merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy kale, tomatoes and potatoes

loans.name: Josphine

texts.en:
Josephine is 39 years old. She is a single mother of four children who are 19, 17, 13 and 10 years old. She has been running a general store and a beauty shop for the past two years old with a monthly income of KES 20,000, which she uses to support her business and family.
 
She is applying for her second loan from KADET. She has been loaned KES 50,000 after repaying the previous loan successfully. She will use the loan to buy a blow dryer, hair conditioners, shampoos, and hair extensions. With the remaining loan funds, she will expand her salon and add more stock to her general store like unga, sugar, cooking oil, etc 

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to open a restaurant and employ some workers, which will help her improve the living standard of her family.

loans.use: to buy a blow dryer, hair conditioners, shampoos, hair extensions, to expand her salon and to add more stock to her general store like unga, sugar, cooking oil, etc .

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy beans, sorghum and peanuts for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase medicine for the pharmacy and also buy vegetables, fruits, potatoes and green maize for grocery business to sell

loans.name: Sharifmo

texts.ru: Шарифмо проживает в городе Душанбе. Ей 33 года. Вдова. Имеет двоих детей. У нее среднее образование. Она занимается производством макарон и пельменей. Этим видом деятельности Шарифмо занимается два года. Целью получения кредита является приобретение аппарата для изготовления макарон.
texts.en: Sharifmo lives in the city of Dushanbe.  She is 33 years old, a widow and has two children.  She has a secondary education and is involved in making pasta and pelmeni (meat-filled dumplings).  Sharifmo has been involved in this type of business for two years.  She is requesting this loan in order to purchase a pasta-making machine.

loans.use: to purchase a pasta-making machine

loans.name: Urumuli / Rbv Group

texts.fr: Thérèse  est agricultrice, elle membre du groupe Urumuri. Elle est veuve, elle est  âgé de 54 ans. Elle a  5 enfants entre 7 ans et  19 ans. Elle a trois enfants qui vont à l’école, elle est né au  Rwanda.son niveau d’éducation est 4 ans de primaire. C’est son deuxième  cycle de prêt avec ACB. Elle va utiliser le prêt pour acheter 400kgs de pommes de terre, 50kgs d’engrais chimique, et paye la main d’œuvre. Sa stratégie pour la croissance de l’affaire  est d’acheter des champs  pour augmenter la production des pommes des terres. Dans l’avenir il voudrait devenir un grand commerçante connue dans sa région et distributeur des pommes de terre partout dans sa région et agrandir son business, elle voudrait éduquer ses enfants et prépare un meilleur avenir  pour sa famille
texts.en: Thérèse is a farmer and a member of the Urumuri groupe. Born in Rwanda, Thérèse is a 54-year old widow and the mother of 5 children between the ages of 7 and 19, three of whom go to school. She herself had 4 years of primary school. This is her second loan cycle with ACB. She will use the loan to buy 400 kilograms of potatoes and 50 kilograms of chemical fertilizer, and to pay the manual labourers. In order to be able to pay for the education of her children and give her family a better future, Thérèse's goals include growing her business and she plans to buy more fields so that she can increase potato production. She would eventually like to become a large, reputable seller and distributor of potatoes in her region.

loans.use: to buy 400 kgs of potatoes and 50 kgs of chemical fertilizer, and to pay the manual labourers

loans.name: Naseem's Group

texts.en:
Naseem is 35 years old and married. Her husband works in an agriculture department. Naseem is a very hard working person. She operates a grocery store at her home through which she sells different household items to her clients at reasonable rates. She has given birth to five children. Four of her children are studying and her youngest son is 8 years old and hasn’t started his education yet.
 
Naseem has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further expansion of her grocery store business. With the loan, she will add a better variety of groceries to her store, which will allow her to fulfill the needs of her clients on time and increase her profits. She has been doing this business for the past five years and is very confident that an investment will have a positive impact on her business.

loans.use: To buy groceries for her grocery store business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy sugar, maize flour and cooking fat for her shop

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay school fees for her kids and for the construction of a house.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is 35 years old and married to Julius. She has been running a green grocer business for the past ten years with a monthly income of 6,000 Kenyan shillings (KES), which she uses to support her business and family.

Agnes is applying for her fourth loan with KADET after repaying the previous loans successfully. She has been loaned 40,000 KES, which she will use to buy kale, cabbages and green maize to add to her business. With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to educate her children up to university level and build premises to run her business.

loans.use: to buy kale, cabbages and green maize to add to her business

loans.name: Samir

texts.en: Samir is 33 years old. He is married and has one son. Samir is the sole breadwinner and his only income comes from the cultivation and sale of large livestock at the local market. Every year, he buys young heifers from the farms in adjacent villages. He raises them with the help of his wife and children and then sells the adult cows and bulls to local butchers. His monthly profit is about $250 USD. Samir would like to expand his business, as the income from his existing herd isn't enough to provide for his family. He plans to purchase additional young cattle. To do this, he needs to invest an additional 1,000 ANZ in his business.

loans.use: to purchase two cattle and fodder

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase three cattle

loans.name: Ismat

texts.ru:
Исмат женат и любящий отец 5 детей. Он воспитанный и добросовестный человек. Более 3 лет он занимается скотоводством. Его жена помогает ему в этом бизнесе, когда он уходит на рынок за покупками скота она ухаживает и кормить их. Он хочет расширить свой бизнес и максимизировать свой прибыль, чтобы обеспечить свою семью и устроит своих детей в учебных заведениях. Исмат хотел бы получить займ в размере 4600 Сомони для покупки скота и пополнение оборотного капитала. Он благодарен всем кредиторам за их помощь и милосердие.  

More about Tajikistan and IMON International

Tajikistan is known for its rich history, which includes a key post along the Silk Road and the end of Alexander the Great's rule. It has also produced great thinkers, philosophers, scientists and poets, including Rudaki, Avicenna, Ferdowsi, Omar Khayyam, Jomi, and Rumi. The country is home to communities that still speak the ancient Sogdian language, epic mountain passes, and a civilization that dates back to the 4th millennium BC. And, even today, it is a complex mixture of the Islamic faith, Soviet culture, New West culture and Central Asian traditions.

But Tajikistan is also the poorest of the former Soviet republics. The civil war, which ignited soon after its independence from the U.S.S.R., further damaged the already weak economy. In addition, 93% of the country is mountainous and only 7% of the land is arable. These conditions have resulted in high levels of unemployment and have forced hundreds of thousands to seek work in other countries, mainly Russia. While the people of Tajikistan are working to improve its agricultural production and manufacturing sector, nearly two-thirds of the population still live in abject poverty.

IMON's History

Since December 2007, IMON International has worked closely with Kiva and Kiva lenders to ensure that poor and low income clients represent a viable business proposition. Funds raised through Kiva have already been distributed to thousands of IMON International's clients and will continue to provide thousands more with permanent access to the varied financial services they need. To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit: www.imon.tj
texts.en: Ismat is married and is a loving father of five children.  He is a well-mannered and conscientious person.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for over three years.  His wife helps him with this business and looks after and feeds the livestock, when Ismat goes to the market to buy livestock.  He wants to expand his business and maximize his profits in order to provide for his family and place his children into schools.  Ismat wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 4600 Somoni for the purchase of livestock and increasing turnover.  He is grateful to all creditors for their help and mercy.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase two cattle and fodder

loans.name: Zarina

texts.ru: Зарина проживает в городе Душанбе. Ей 25 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Её муж таксист. Сама Зарина занимается шитьем национальных платьев. Этим видом деятельности она занимается два года. Кредит берет для приобретения швейной машинки.
texts.en: Zarina lives in the city of Dushanbe.  She is 25 years old, married and has three children.  Her husband is a taxi driver.  Zarina is involved in sewing national dresses. She has been working in this field for two years.  Zarina is requesting this loan for the purchase of a sewing machine.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Yormahmad

texts.ru:
Ёрмахмад 54 года, живет со своей женой и у них 4 взрослых детей. Он всегда хотел улучшить свои жилищные условия. Ёрмахмад занимается фермерством в течение 12 лет. Он начал этот вид бизнеса самостоятельно. Ёрмахмад желает иметь возможность диверсифицировать свой урожай. С помощью займа он будет купить семена и разные удобрения для получения более качественного урожая и продать их по более выгодной цене. 
 
More about Tajikistan and IMON International

Tajikistan is known for its rich history, which includes a key post along the Silk Road and the end of Alexander the Great's rule. It has also produced great thinkers, philosophers, scientists and poets, including Rudaki, Avicenna, Ferdowsi, Omar Khayyam, Jomi, and Rumi. The country is home to communities that still speak the ancient Sogdian language, epic mountain passes, and a civilization that dates back to the 4th millennium BC. And, even today, it is a complex mixture of the Islamic faith, Soviet culture, New West culture and Central Asian traditions.

texts.en: Yormahmad is 54 years old, lives with his family and has four grown children.  He has always wanted to improve his living conditions.  Yormahmad has been involved in agriculture for 12 years.  He started this business on his own.  Yormahmad wishes to have the ability to diversify his harvest.  With the help of this loan, he will buy seeds and various fertilizers to obtain a quality harvest and sells it at a more profitable price.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more chickens and turkeys.

loans.name: Shameem's Group

texts.en:
Shameem is a very supportive and caring lady by nature. She is a beauty expert and operates a beauty salon from her home. She is known for good quality services among her clients in the community, and she earns good profits, particularly in the wedding season. Besides her work, she carries out her responsibilities as a housewife very well and makes the utmost effort to provide comfort to her family by fulfilling their needs. Her husband is an employee in a private organization. 

Shameem has applied for a loan from Kiva's partner Asasah for the further expansion of her beauty salon business. With the loan, she will buy cosmetics and beauty products such as face masks and creams, etc., to provide better quality services to her clients. Wedding season will be starting soon after Eid (a Muslim holiday) and she is very confident that she will get good orders which will help her to increase her earning. 

In the photo, the lady raising her hand is Shameem.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and beauty products for a beauty salon.

loans.name: Haknazar

texts.ru:
Хакназар живет в городе Таджикистане вместе со своей семьей, и в течение многих лет  посвящает себя к выращиванию сельхозпродукции. Ему в этом бизнесе помогают жена и дети. Хакназар попросил займ в размере $3000 долларов США для покупки семян и удобрений. Это позволит ему сделать большую прибыль, которая в свою очередь, позволит улучшить условия жизни семьи. В будущем он хочет расширить свою землю для посева и таким образом обеспечить своих детей своим собственным бизнесом.

More about Tajikistan and IMON International

Tajikistan is known for its rich history, which includes a key post along the Silk Road and the end of Alexander the Great's rule. It has also produced great thinkers, philosophers, scientists and poets, including Rudaki, Avicenna, Ferdowsi, Omar Khayyam, Jomi, and Rumi. These conditions have resulted in high levels of unemployment and have forced hundreds of thousands to seek work in other countries, mainly Russia. While the people of Tajikistan are working to improve its agricultural production and manufacturing sector, nearly two-thirds of the population still live in abject poverty.

Funds raised through Kiva have already been distributed to thousands of IMON International's clients and will continue to provide thousands more with permanent access to the varied financial services they need. To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit: www.imon.tj
texts.en: Haknazar lives in a city in Tajikistan together with his family, and has been devoted to growing agricultural crops for many years.  His wife and children help him with this business.  Haknazar requested a loan in the sum of $3000 for the purchase of seeds and fertilizers.  This would allow him to make a large profit, which would in turn, allow to improve his family's quality of life.  In the future, he wants to expand his land for sowing and, thus, provide his children with their own business.

loans.use: purchase of seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is a 33-year-old, widowed mother of four children. She has been running a retail shop for the past three years with the monthly income of KES 6,000, which she uses to support her family.

She is applying for her fourth loan of KES 30,000 from KADET after repaying the previous loans successfully. She will use the loan to add stocks of rice, sugar, and cooking fat to her shop.

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes are to venture into a green grocery business which she believes will sustain her family.

loans.use: To add stocks of rice, sugar, and cooking fat to her shop.

loans.name: Dukore Twitezimbere Group

texts.fr:
Drocelle (la troisième dame à gauche avec le tricot rouge) fait partie du groupe DukoreTwitezimbere. Elle est née au Rwanda et a 46 ans. Elle est mariée et elle a 5 enfants de 7 à 25 ans, dont 2 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est 7 ans de primaire. 

Drocelle est agricultrice. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Elle va utiliser son crédit pour acheter 300 kgs de pommes de terre, 1 sac de fertilisants(NPK), 30L et payer la main d’œuvre. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d‘augmenter la capacité en achetant d’autre champs. Dans les prochaines années, Drocelle voudrait devenir une grande agricultrice, acheter deux vaches pour sa famille et payer les frais d’études universitaire pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
Drocelle (the third woman from the left, with the red jumper) is part of the group Dukore Twitezimbere. Born in Rwanda, she is 46 years old and is married with 5 children between the ages of 7 and 25, two of whom go to school. She herself has 7 years of primary school education. 

Drocelle is a farmer and this is her first loan cycle with ACB. She will use the loan to buy 300 kgs of potatoes and a 30-liter bag of NPK fertilizer, and to pay the labourers.

Over the next few years, Drocelle would like to become a large farmer and she plans to grow her business by buying more fields to increase crop production. She would also like to buy 2 cows for her family, and pay for her children´s university education.

loans.use: to buy 300 kgs of potatoes and a 30-liter bag of NPK fertilizer, and to pay the labourers

loans.name: Yusuf

texts.ru:
У Юсуфа есть небольшой бизнес по продаже товаров моющих средств и парфюмерии на центральном рынке своего города. Будучи опытным предпринимателем, несмотря на свой юный возраст, он успешно занимается этим видом бизнесом в течение 2 лет и предлагает продукцию хорошего качества по низким ценам. Юсуф поддерживает своих родителей и является образцом среди своих сверстников. Он попросил займ в размере 5500 сомони для расширения ассортимента своего товара. Это первый займ Юсуфа и он надеется, что он поможет ему повысить прибыльность его бизнеса и таким образом улучшить условия жизни его семьи. 
 

More about Tajikistan and IMON International

Tajikistan is known for its rich history, which includes a key post along the Silk Road and the end of Alexander the Great's rule. It has also produced great thinkers, philosophers, scientists and poets, including Rudaki, Avicenna, Ferdowsi, Omar Khayyam, Jomi, and Rumi. The country is home to communities that still speak the ancient Sogdian language, epic mountain passes, and a civilization that dates back to the 4th millennium BC. And, even today, it is a complex mixture of the Islamic faith, Soviet culture, New West culture and Central Asian traditions.

But Tajikistan is also the poorest of the former Soviet republics. The civil war, which ignited soon after its independence from the U.S.S.R., further damaged the already weak economy. These conditions have resulted in high levels of unemployment and have forced hundreds of thousands to seek work in other countries, mainly Russia. While the people of Tajikistan are working to improve its agricultural production and manufacturing sector, nearly two-thirds of the population still live in abject poverty.

IMON's History

Since December 2007, IMON International has worked closely with Kiva and Kiva lenders to ensure that poor and low income clients represent a viable business proposition. Funds raised through Kiva have already been distributed to thousands of IMON International's clients and will continue to provide thousands more with permanent access to the varied financial services they need. To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit: www.imon.tj
texts.en: Yusuf has a small business of selling cleaning products and perfumery, located at the central market of his town.  Being an experienced entrepreneur, despite his young age, he has been successfully running this business for two years and offers good quality products at low prices.  Yusuf supports his parents and, as such, is a role model among his peers.  He requested a loan in the sum of 5500 somoni in order to expand the assortment of his merchandise.  This is Yusuf's first loan, and he hopes that it will help him increase his business profits and, thus, improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase laundry detergents, soap, toothpaste and various cleaning products

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 52 years old and married to Catherine. They are blessed with four children. He has been selling cereals for the past three years with a monthly income of KES 15,000, which he uses to support his family and business.

He is applying for his first loan from KADET after being introduced by an existing KADET customer. He has been loaned KES 20,000. He will use the loan to buy sacks of maize, beans and rice. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to open a wholesale shop, which will help him improve the living standard of his family.

loans.use: To buy sacks of maize, beans and rice

loans.name: Kurbon

texts.ru:
Курбону 49 лет. Он живет с женой и у них 7 детей. Курбон вырос в большой семье, и он с самого раннего возраста помогал отцу в поле, и именно поэтому он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродукции. Курбон говорит, что он очень благодарен за то, что  благодаря поддержке своей семьи, он может обеспечить свою семью полноценной жизнью. Курбон запрашивает займ для покупки купить сырья, такие как: семена, инсектициды, удобрения, химические продукты и т. д., которые помогают ему увеличить свой урожайность. 
 
More about Tajikistan and IMON International

Tajikistan is known for its rich history, which includes a key post along the Silk Road and the end of Alexander the Great's rule. It has also produced great thinkers, philosophers, scientists and poets, including Rudaki, Avicenna, Ferdowsi, Omar Khayyam, Jomi, and Rumi. The country is home to communities that still speak the ancient Sogdian language, epic mountain passes, and a civilization that dates back to the 4th millennium BC. And, even today, it is a complex mixture of the Islamic faith, Soviet culture, New West culture and Central Asian traditions.

But Tajikistan is also the poorest of the former Soviet republics. The civil war, which ignited soon after its independence from the U.S.S.R., further damaged the already weak economy. In addition, 93% of the country is mountainous and only 7% of the land is arable. These conditions have resulted in high levels of unemployment and have forced hundreds of thousands to seek work in other countries, mainly Russia. While the people of Tajikistan are working to improve its agricultural production and manufacturing sector, nearly two-thirds of the population still live in abject poverty.

Since December 2007, IMON International has worked closely with Kiva and Kiva lenders to ensure that poor and low income clients represent a viable business proposition. Funds raised through Kiva have already been distributed to thousands of IMON International's clients and will continue to provide thousands more with permanent access to the varied financial services they need. To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit: www.imon.tj
texts.en: Kurbon is 49 years old.  He lives with his wife and their seven children.  Kurbon grew up in a large family and used to help his father in the field since the young age.  This is why he is involved in growing agricultural crops.  Kurbon says that he is very grateful to his family for the support, which enabled him to provide his family with a good quality of life.  Kurbon is requesting this loan for the purchase of raw materials, such as seeds, insecticides, fertilizers, chemical products, etc., which help him increase his harvest yield.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a piece of land for mixed crop farming

loans.name: Gayane

texts.ru:
Гаянэ 45 лет, она проживает в городе Ванадзоре вместе с мужем и тремя сыновьями. Муж Гаянэ работает на Ванадзорском Химическом заводе, младший сын учится в школе, средний недавно вернулся из армии, а старший сын окончил институт в этом году и в данный момент занят поиском работы. 
Гаянэ арендует помещение на Ванадзорской ярмарке и торгует женской, мужской и детской одеждой. 2-3 раза в месяц, Гаянэ и ее коллеги по торговле арендуют автомобиль и едут за товаром в Ереван. Гаянэ говорит, что наибольшим спросом пользуется детская и женская одежда, поэтому из мужской одежды она продает только майки и сорочки. 
Гаянэ необходим кредит на сумму 700.000 для покупки одежды в преддверии начала нового учебного года.
texts.en: Gayane is 45 years old.  She lives in the city of Vanadzor with her husband and three sons.  Gayane's husband works at the Vanadzor Chemical plant, the youngest son goes to school, the middle son recently returned from the army, and the oldest graduated from a university this year and is currenly looking for work.  Gayane leases a space at the Vanadzor market and sells women's, men's and children's clothing 2-3 times per month.  Gayane and her work colleagues rent a car and go to Yerevan for merchandise.  She says that children's and women's clothing have the highest demand, and that is why she only sells undergarments out of men's clothing.  Gayane needs a loan in the sum of 700,000 for the purchase of clothing in anticipation of the start of a new school year.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for the new school year

loans.name: Chaloliddin

texts.ru:
Чалолиддин добросовестный и честный человек. Он женат и любящий отец двух детей. Он занимается скотоводством более двух лет. Чалолиддин любит свой бизнес и занимается с удовольствием. Он покупает скот из местных рынка города, привозит их домой и кормит в определенный период. Когда они набирает вес, потом продают их в хороших ценах. Чалолиддин хочет расширить свой бизнес и улучшить свое жилищное условия. Он хотел бы получит займ в размере 1000$ США для покупки скота. Он надеется, что кредиторы будут поддерживать его.  

More about Tajikistan and IMON International

Tajikistan is known for its rich history, which includes a key post along the Silk Road and the end of Alexander the Great's rule. It has also produced great thinkers, philosophers, scientists and poets, including Rudaki, Avicenna, Ferdowsi, Omar Khayyam, Jomi, and Rumi. The country is home to communities that still speak the ancient Sogdian language, epic mountain passes, and a civilization that dates back to the 4th millennium BC. And, even today, it is a complex mixture of the Islamic faith, Soviet culture, New West culture and Central Asian traditions.

But Tajikistan is also the poorest of the former Soviet republics. The civil war, which ignited soon after its independence from the U.S.S.R., further damaged the already weak economy. In addition, 93% of the country is mountainous and only 7% of the land is arable. These conditions have resulted in high levels of unemployment and have forced hundreds of thousands to seek work in other countries, mainly Russia. While the people of Tajikistan are working to improve its agricultural production and manufacturing sector, nearly two-thirds of the population still live in abject poverty.

IMON's History

Since December 2007, IMON International has worked closely with Kiva and Kiva lenders to ensure that poor and low income clients represent a viable business proposition. Funds raised through Kiva have already been distributed to thousands of IMON International's clients and will continue to provide thousands more with permanent access to the varied financial services they need. To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit: www.imon.tj
texts.en: Chaloliddin is a conscientious and honest person.  He is married and is a loving father of two children.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for two years.  Chaloliddin loves his business and enjoys being involved in it.  He buys livestock at the local city markets, brings it home and feeds for a certain period of time.  When livestock gains weight, he sells it at a good price.  Chaloliddin want to expand his business and improve his living conditions.  He want to obtain a loan in the sum of $1000 for the purchase of livestock.  He hopes that creditors will support him.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
For the last 10 years, Nancy has been practicing crop farming and raising livestock. She is 47 years old and married to David. They have eight children.

She was introduced to KADET by a friend who is also a KADET client. She paid the other loans well and in good time. She has been loaned KES 42,000. She intends to use the loan to buy animal feed, fertilizers and seedlings.

In the future, Nancy hopes to practice large-scale farming, which will increase her income.

loans.use: To buy animal feed, fertilizers and seedlings.

loans.name: Abdurazok

texts.ru: Абдуразок проживает в городе Исфара. Ему 42 года. Он женат. У него двое детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам Абдуразок занимается торговлей. Он открыл магазин в центре города, где продает запасные части телефонов, легковых и грузовых машин. В этой области он уже 20 лет. Кредит берет для приобретения запчастей автомашины.
texts.en: Abdurazok lives in the city of Isfara.  He is 42 years old, married and has two children.  His wife is a homemaker.  Abdurazok is involved in retail sales.  He opened a store in the city center, where he sells spare parts for telephones, passenger cars and trucks.  He has been in this business for twenty years.  Abdurazok is requesting this loan for the purchase of auto parts.

loans.use: to purchase auto parts

loans.name: Zhyldyzkhan

texts.ru:
Жылдызхан 51 год, замужем , является матерью  8-ых детей.   Жылдызхан - активная, решительная и трудолюбивая женщина.   Ее муж  Алижан поддерживает свою семью тем, что занимается перевозкой пассажиров.  
Жылдызхан  начала свой бизнес в  сельском хозяйстве в 1991 году.  После развала Советского Союза многодетной семье было трудно, и  для того, чтобы прокормить свою семью, женщина решила заняться разведением скота и продажей молочной продукции  на местном рынке. На сегодняшний день семья занимается животноводством, полеводством,  садоводством, и реализацией своей продукции. 
На данный момент  Жылдызхан достигла хорошего результата  - ее хозяйство, насчитывающее пять дойных коров и восемь овец позволяет получать доход в сумме около 10,000 сом (KGS)  в месяц от продажи молочной и мясной продукции. Для дальнейшего расширения и развития своего бизнеса, Жылдызхан обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) для увеличения поголовья скота.
texts.en: Zhyldyzkhan is 51 years old, married and is a mother of eight children.  Zhyldyzkhan is an active, decisive and hard-working woman.  Her husband, Alijan, supports the family by providing passenger transportation.  Zhyldyzkhan started her business in 1991.  After the fall of the Soviet Union, the family was going through hard times, and she decided to get involved in breeding livestock and sales of dairy products at the local market in order to feed her family.  Today, the family is involved in animal husbandry, farming, gardening and sales of their products.  Zhyldyzkhan achieved a good result.  Her household that includes five dairy cows and eight sheep yield a monthly income of about 10,000 som (KGS) from the sales of dairy and meat products.  Zhyldyzkhan went to "Bai Tushum and Partners" to obtain a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) in order to expand and develop her business further by increasing the quantity of livestock.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Redemta

texts.en:
Redemta is 59 years old and married with 12 children. She has been a farmer for the past seven years with a monthly income of KES 7,000, which she uses to support her family.

She is applying for her fifth loan of KES 55,000 from KADET LTD, after repaying the previous loans successfully. She will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her farm. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her three remaining children who depend on her. Her hopes are to buy another piece of land for farming and open a retail shop.

loans.use: To buy seedlings and fertilizer for her farm.

loans.name: Everlyne

texts.en: Everlyne is 56 years old, married and has five children between 35 and 20 years old. She operates a grocery store at Enjinja in Kakamega. She has been in this business for three years now. She says that the business is good and the major challenge she has is financial constraints. However, she works hard from early morning to late evening to make sure her business is doing well.
