She is using her loan of KES 30,000 to buy tomatoes, onions and other vegetables to grow her business and meet the demands of her customers. She sees herself growing her business to wholesale. She describes herself as a visionary woman.

loans.use: To purchase tomatoes, onions and other vegetables

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 40 bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Jeritar

texts.en:
Jeritar is 50 years old and married to Thomas. They are blessed with two children who are twenty three and fifteen years old. She owns a clothing shop, and she has been in the business for a period of six years, earning a monthly income of KES 6,000.

She has borrowed KES 20,000 from KADET LTD. This is her second loan and she wishes to use this money to purchase more variety of clothing materials for her shop. With the anticipated profits, she will improve the living standards of her family.

She hopes to be financially stable to improve her business.

loans.use: To purchase more clothing materials for her business

loans.name: Emprendedoras De Villa Bonita Group

texts.es:
Este Comité se formó gracias a la iniciativa D. la Señora Maria, ya que ella contactó con una D. las asesoras, y D. esa forma se informó del programa D. Mujeres emprendedoras D. la Fundación y decidió organizar a sus amigas y vecinas del barrio. Actualmente el grupo está integrado por 20 mujeres D. la ciudad D. Villa Elisa, donD. todas ellas trabajan dentro D. un ambiente D. cooperación, respeto y por sobre todo responsabilidad.
La señora Maria tiene una mercería, en la cual venD. todo tipo D. productos, como ser frazadas, sabanas(las cuales ella misma elabora), calzados, artículos para regalos y otros. Comenta que tiene muchos clientes debido a la variedad D. artículos que tiene. Dice que gracias a su negocio ella ha podido generar los ingresos necesarios para mantener a su familia y todos aquellos que D. cierta forma dependen D. ella. Una D. sus metas es agrandar su mercería, para poder tener más capacidad y D. esa forma ofrecer mayores productos a sus clientes.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. frazadas, edredones, calzados y artículos para regalos, para que D. esa forma pueda abastecer su negocio y ofrecer más variedad a sus clientes. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le brinda.
texts.en:
This committee was started thanks to the efforts of Sra. Maria, who contacted one of the advisors at Fundación Paraguaya in order to learn about the Program of Women Entrepreneurs.  This group currently has 20 members who are friends and neighbors from the city of Villa Elisa.  They all work in a spirit of cooperation, respect, and above all, responsibility.  

Sra. Maria has a haberdashery where she sells all types of products such as blankets, bed sheets (that she produces herself), shoes, and gift items.  She says that she has many customers who desire the variety of products that she offers.  Thanks to her business, Maria has been able to generate the necessary income to maintain her family.  One of her goals is to enlarge her haberdashery so as to have more capacity.  

Maria is requesting a loan in order to buy blankets, bedspreads, shoes, and gift items so that she can restock her business and offer more variety to her customers.  She is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya for the opportunity that has been given to her.

loans.use: to buy blankets, bedspreads, shoes, and gift items.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is 28 years old and married to Waigera. She has been running an M-pesa (PHONE MONEY TRANSFER) shop for the past three years with a monthly income of KES 8,500, which she uses to support her family members.

She is applying for her first loan of KES 10,000 from KADET LTD after being introduced by a KADET staff member. Ruth will use the loan to renovate the M-pesa shop (PHONE MONEY TRANSFER). 

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children and be prosperous.

loans.use: To renovate her Mpesa shop( PHONE MONEY TRANSFER)

loans.name: Shazia's Group

texts.en:
Shazia is married and her husband is a milk seller by profession. He operates his business from his home and earns a good profit. He has a buffalo, and takes its milk and sells it to different people in his community. Shazia is a housewife who stays at home and does her household responsibilities. She also supports her husband in his milk selling business. She milks the buffalo and cleans i's place.  

She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further expansion of her husband’s business. With the loan, he will buy another buffalo, which will increase the milk productivity and increase his sales. He has been operating his business for many years and Shazia is hopeful that by purchasing another buffalo, he will successfully be able to improve the financial condition of his business.

loans.use: To buy another buffalo

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To add a stock of sugar, ground nuts, and detergents.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more chickens

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en: Eunice is a married woman with five children. She operates a handbag sales business at Kakamega. She has been in this business for five years now. She says that the business is good and the major challenge she has is financial constraints. However, she works hard from early morning to late evening to make sure her business is doing well. She is using her loan of KES 80,000 to buy more handbags to sell to her customers while meeting their demand. She sees herself growing her business into wholesale. She describes herself as ambitious, patient and determined.

loans.use: to purchase more handbags to sell

loans.name: Wesley

texts.en:
Wesley is 57 years old and married to Susan. They are blessed with four children who are 28, 25, 20 and 18 years old. He owns a farm in Saniak and raises livestock. He has been operating his farm for a period of five years, earning a monthly income of KES 5,000.

He has borrowed a loan from KADET LTD for KES 10,000. This is his second loan after servicing the previous one successfully. He plans to use this loan to purchase dairy feed. The anticipated profit will be used to purchase a dairy cow.

He hopes to educate his children to higher levels of education.

loans.use: To purchase animal feed

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to construct an irrigation dam for her farm alongside her salon business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to hire laborers and buy seeds to plant

loans.name: Pape Lamine

texts.fr: Monsieur Pape Lamine vit au Sénégal depuis plusieurs années. C’est un jeune marié de 33ans qui s’active dans le secteur de l’enseignement coranique  dans sa zone d’habitation. Parallèlement  aussi  il pratique des activités agricoles. Il a choisi ces activités par amour mais  dans le but de se procurer des revenus stables. Ce qui l’intéresse  le plus dans ses activités c’est l’éducation qu’il inculque aux enfants pour les aider a mieux affronter la vie. Il est membre d’un des guichets  de l’U-IMCEC  depuis avril 2011. Il sollicite un crédit de 400 000 frs prévu pour la réfection de sa maison  qu’il  veut sécuriser. Ce financement  lui permettra de réaliser un grand projet qu’il a longtemps rêvé.
texts.en:
Pape Lamine has lived in Senegal for several years. He is 33 years old and married, and works as a teacher of the Koran in his neighborhood. At the same time, he does some farming. He chose these activities because he likes them but also with the goal of having a steady income. What he enjoys most about his work is the education that he passes on to the children, to help them meet life's challenges. 

He has been a member of one of the U-IMCEC branches since April 2011. He is requesting a loan of 40,000 CFA francs for improvements to his house, which he wants to make more secure. This loan will allow him to carry out this important project that he has been dreaming of for a long time.

loans.use: to carry out home improvement.

loans.name: Santa Clara Group

texts.es:
23 mujeres de Ciudad del Este se unieron con el objetivo de desarrollar el programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la Fundación Paraguaya. Como principal objetivo quieren generar mayores ingresos para sus familias e hijos, ya que la mayoría de las mujeres son madres solteras, jefas de familia. Además de la parte económica desean crecer cambien en lo personal. Actualmente se encuentran en el décimo ciclo, donde todas ellas trabajan en un ambiente de cooperación y respeto.
LA señora Yessica se dedica a la venta de Frutas, por medio de este trabajo puede mantenerse y mantener a su familia y darles así una vida digna y decorosa. Comenta que tiene todo tipo de frutas, por lo que atrae a muchos clientes, lo que por consiguiente le genera muy buenos ingresos. Una de sus metas es tener un propio local donde pueda tener su frutería y de esa forma ir creciendo en el mercado comercial.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de frutas, para abastecerse y de esa forma poder cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Piensa que de obtener el crédito, el mismo le será de mucha ayuda en sus proyectos. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le brinda.
texts.en:
A group of 23 women in Ciudad del Este got together in an aim to develop the women entrepreneurs' program at the Fundación Paraguaya.  Their main goal is to generate more income for their families and children, since most of them are single mothers and heads of family.  Apart from their economic concerns they also want to grow personally.  They are now in their tenth cycle all working in an environment of cooperation and respect.

Ms. Yessica sells fruit and earns a living this way in order to support her family and give them a dignified, proper lifestyle.  She offers all kinds of fruit which attracts many customers, thereby generating a good income.  One of her goals is to have her own fruit shop so she can grow in the commercial aspect.

She is requesting a loan to buy fruit so she can meet customer demand.  The loan will help her greatly with her projects.  She is grateful to the Fundación for this opportunity.

loans.use: To buy fruit to sell.

loans.name: Mamadou Lamine

texts.fr:
Mamadou Lamine est  un homme  âge de 25ans. Il est marié.  Ils n’ont pas encore d’enfant.
Mamadou Lamine a travaillé comme Pâtisserie depuis 2001. Il fait la pâtisserie pour les clients d’un grand hotel. Depuis un an il a ouvert son propre pâtisserie ou il cuisine les gâteaux et les pizzas pour les gens de sa localité. Il travaille avec 3 employés. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est d’équipé sa cuisine.
Mamadou Lamine a requis son 1er crédit de UIMCEC afin d’acheter l’ équipement cuisinier et la matière 1ere en grande quantité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Mamadou Lamine voudrait bien établir le réputation de son restaurant. Il dit qu’avec les profits, il prévoit agrandir sa pâtisserie.
texts.en:
Mamadou Lamine is a 25-year old man, who is married but does not yet have any children. He has worked as a pastry chef since 2001 and bakes for the customers of a large hotel. He opened his own patisserie a year ago and makes cakes and pizzas for the people in his town. He works with three employees. His main problem at the moment is to fit out his kitchen.

Mamadou Lamine has requested his first loan from UIMCEC in order to buy kitchen equipment and raw materials in large quantities. In the coming years he would like to be able to build up his restaurant's reputation. He says that he is planning to extend his patisserie with the profits.

loans.use: to buy kitchen equipment for his patisserie

loans.name: Papy Kelard

texts.fr:
Client âgé de 32 ans, marié et père de 2 enfants dont l’âge varie entre 4 ans et 12 ans, Il est en activite depuis 15 ans.
Il encaisse en moyenne 5000 à 15 000 F CFA par jour. A l’octroie de ce prêt, il va renforcer son commerce en achetant 10 pagnes real pour faire des chemises et ensembles dames, 3 rouleaux de la doublure, 1 rouleau de la vaseline , des bobines de fils à coudre , une machine à coudre.

Avec un bon accueil des clients et une grande publicité, ce client à une bonne réputation dans le quartier , il s’approvisionne auprès des grands fournisseur et fait des benefices enormes,  il travaille aussi avec les jeunes filles meres sur le programme de reinsertion pour les initier a la coupe et couture,  il pense épargner à la longue afin d’ouvrir un grand atelier où il pourra produire en grande quantité et fournir des prêts à porter dans les boutiques. Comme un bon père , il fait face au besoin de sa famille en finançant les études de ses enfants et en initiant sa famille au commerce.
texts.en: This client is 32 years old, married, and the father of two children, from 4 to 21 years old. He has been working for fifteen years. He takes in 5,000 to 15,000 francs CFA on average each day. Upon being granted this loan, he is going to bolster his business by buying 10 lengths of Real pagnes (colorful West African cloth) to make shirts and women's outfits; 3 rolls of lining material; a roll of Vaseline; some spools of thread; and a sewing machine. Accommodating his customers well and offering big promotions, this client has a good reputation in his district. He gets his supplies from the major suppliers and makes enormous profits. He also works with young mothers in a jobs program for introducing them to sewing and tailoring. He is thinking of saving money over time in order to open a large workshop where he can have high output and can supply ready-to-wear clothing to shops. Like a good father, he addresses the needs of his family by covering the cost of schooling for the children and introducing his family to commerce.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, Wax-brand cloth, Real-brand cloth, sewing accessories, 'vaseline', buttons, and thread

loans.name: Erick

texts.en:
Erick is a young man who is 23 years old. He operates a phone accessory shop, he has been in the business for a period of two years, earning a monthly income of KES 6,000.

He has borrowed a loan of KES 20,000 from KADET LTD as his first loan and hopes to use the money to purchase more phone accessories. The profits will be used as savings for future investment.

He dreams of growing his business, even owning a wholesale accessory shop and improving his living standards.

loans.use: To purchase more phone accessories for his shop

loans.name: Nery Arnulfo

texts.es: Nery Arnulfo de cincuenta y uno años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y su hijo. El posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues siempre tiene lo que las personas necesitan, con productos de excelente calidad y a un buen precio; Nery es una hombre trabajador lleno de muchas metas e ideales por cumplir el piensa que quien sigue el camino constante y con dedicación tendrá grandes éxitos en su vida, una de sus metas es ver crecer su negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar golosinas, productos instantáneos,  granos básicos, bebidas, jabones entre otros de los que no posee y sus clientes demandan. Nery Arnulfo tiene la confianza de que su arduo trabajo le permitirá darle a su familia una vida plena con seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Nery Arnulfo is 51 and lives with his life partner and their son.  He has a store where he sells basic household goods.  Lately he has acquired many customers because he always has what people need, with excellent-quality products at a good price.

Nery is a hard-working man full of many goals and ideals to accomplish.  He thinks that whoever follows a constant path with dedication will have great success in life.  One of his goals is to see his business grow, so he is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy candy, instant products, basic grains, beverages, and soap, among other products he doesn't have that his customers want.  Nery Arnulfo is confident that his hard work will allow him to give his family a life of economic security.

loans.use: to buy candy, instant products, basic grains, beverages, and soap.

loans.name: Alphonsine

texts.fr:
Cliente  âgé de  52 ans, Divorcée et mère de Quatre (4) enfants dont l’âge varie entre 18 ans et  32 ans. 
N’ayant pas de soutien pour poursuivre ses études supérieurs, elle ouvre un dépôt et  se lance dans la vente des poissons salés en gros  depuis 41 ans.
Ses ventes sont considérables , elle encaisse en moyenne 30 000 à 40 000 F par jour. 
Elle s'approvisionne aupres des ses autres fournisseurs a Pointe Noire.
A l’octroie de ce prêt  elle va renforcer le stock de sa marchandise en achetant 10 cartons de poissons salés Maquerelles, 5 cartons de poissons salés de morue, thons, corvinas..
Avec un bon accueil des clients et une grande publicité, cette cliente à une bonne réputation dans le marché et son entourage.
 Avec les bénéfices de ses ventes, elle pense épargner et à la longue, ouvrir un autre dépôt de poissons salés. Comme une bonne mère de famille, elle pense construire une maison dans un terrain qu’elle possède.
texts.en:
This client is 52 years old, divorced, and the mother of four children, from 18 to 32 years old. Not having had the support for pursuing her higher education, she opened a warehouse and started selling salted fish wholesale 41 years ago. Her sales are considerable. She takes in 30,000 to 40,000 francs on average per day. She gets her supplies from other suppliers in Pointe Noire.

Upon being granted this loan, she is going to bolster her inventory of merchandise by buying 10 boxes of salted mackerel and 5 boxes of salted cod, tuna, and corbina. Being very accommodating to her customers and offering promotions, this client has a good reputation in the market and among those around her. 

With the profits from her sales, she is thinking of saving money and, in the future, opening another warehouse for salted fish. Like a good mother, she is thinking of building a house on a plot of land she owns.

loans.use: to buy boxes of salted fish, such as 'flechard', mackerel, cod, tuna, and corbina.

loans.name: Andrew J.'s Group

texts.en: Meet with members of a primary school in Kenema, eastern Sierra Leone. They have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek a loan of 3,500,000 SLL in order to meet their immediate financial challenges like paying school fees, investing in a business, buying house building material, etc. At the end of each month, these teachers will repay SMT out of their monthly salaries. Andrew is the leader of this group. Born in a village called Fandu 54 years ago, he is married and has nine children. Two of the children are in primary school, two are in secondary school and four are in college. Andrew has requested a loan of 1,000,000 SLL in order to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees in his children

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To procure more timber

loans.name: Hilario

texts.es: Hilario vive con su compañera de vida y tiene su negocio en el mercado municipal de la localidad donde vive, él vende productos plasticos y productos de primera necesidad tiene muchos clientes pues el lugar es muy concurrido de personas y además en su puesto siempre tiene lo que la gente necesita; Hilario siempre da muy buenos precios y sus productos son de muy buena calidad, el es un hombre muy entregado a su trabajo piensa que las oportunidades no son producto de la casualidad, más bien son resultado del duro trabajo y en esta oportunidad se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permite comprar productos plásticos, granos básicos, productos instantáneos, golosinas entre otros. Hilario tiene fe que todo el esfuerzo le dará la oportunidad de darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Hilario lives with his life partner and has his business in the local market in the area they live in. He sells plastic products and essential items. He has many clients since the market is crowed and his store always has products his clients need. Hilario always offers good prices and high quality products. He is very dedicated to his work and believes that opportunities are not accidental but a result of hard work. With this opportunity he decided to request INTEGRAL a loan to buy plastic products, basic grains, instant products, sweets, as well as others. Hilario has faith that all of his efforts will give him the opportunity to offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy plastic products, basic grains, instant products, and sweets.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is married to Emily and they have two children aged eighteen and fifteen years.

He has been in the green grocery business for nine years. He sells cereals like beans and maize, and local vegetables, making a monthly profit of KES 22,450. This is his third loan, and he has borrowed KES 60,000. He shall use the loan to buy more grocery stock and sell wholesale.

With the anticipated profits, he shall open a general shop. His dreams are to provide for further education for his children.

loans.use: to buy more grocery stock to sell

loans.name: Yesenia Yamileth

texts.es: Yesenia Yamileth de veintiuno  años de edad vive junto a sus padres. Ella posee una floristería en su hogar que le ayuda para el sustento diario de su familia pero además posee una sala de belleza que complementa su trabajo. Yesenia Yamileth  tiene un don inigualable elabora las flores más bonitas del lugar con diferentes colores rojas, amarillas, rosadas etc., y también  decora adornos florales para toda ocasión ya tiene mucha clientela pues su arte con las manos es del gusto de muchas personas además de que su trabajo es de gran calidad y a precios accesibles. Yesenia es una joven activa que siempre está dispuesta al trabajo ella piensa que utilizando su imaginación y creatividad lograra inspirarse para llegar a lo inimaginable, es por eso que se decide a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materia prima plástico y papel de colores, listones, alambre, pegamento entre otros. Yesenia Yamileth tiene la esperanza de que con su labor lograra darle a su familia seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Yesenia Yamileth is 21 years old and lives with her parents. She has a florist shop in her home, which helps with her family's daily needs. She also has a beauty salon that complements this work. Yesenia Yamileth has an unmatched gift for making the most beautiful flowers around, with different shades of red, yellow, pink, etc. She also makes floral decorations for every occasion. She already has many customers because her handmade art is enjoyed by many people. Her work is also very high-quality and her prices are accessible.

Yesenia is an active young woman who is always ready to work. She thinks that using her imagination and creativity will inspire her to reach the unimaginable, which is why she decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL. It will allow her to buy materials like colored plastic and paper, ribbons, wire, glue, etc. Yesenia Yamileth maintains hope that, through her work, she will be able to achieve economic security for her family.

loans.use: to buy colored plastic and paper, ribbons, wire and glue for making artificial flowers

loans.name: Emilly

texts.en: Emilly is 56 years old, married and has four children, between 18 and 30 years old. She operates a restaurant business where she makes and sells local food to the people of Kambi in Kakamega. She has been in this business for three years now. She says that business is good and the major challenge she has is financial constraints. However, she works hard from early morning to late evening to make sure her business is doing well. She is using her loan of 50,000 Kenyan shillings to buy foodstuffs to make different types of dishes to sell to her customers. She sees herself growing her business, opening restaurants in other areas within Kakamega town, and building a residential house for her family. She describes herself as a visionary woman.

loans.use: to buy rice, stiff porridge, bean stew, meat stew, etc.

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es: Miguel Ángel vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. El posee una venta de ladrillos artesanal en una zona cercana a su hogar dentro de un área rural, ya posee muchos clientes pues el ladrillo que vende es de muy buena calidad y sobre todo a un buen precio además el servicio que ofrece Miguel es inigualable. Siempre recibe a su clientela con una sonrisa en el rostro, la amabilidad lo caracteriza; Miguel Ángel es un hombre entregado a su trabajo siempre dispuesto a esforzarse por lo que desea. Para él es importante trabajar con el corazón para alcanzar el éxito y es así como se decide a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materia prima para la elaboración de ladrillos como arcilla, barro, tierra blanca. Miguel Ángel tiene confianza que así lograra darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Miguel Angel lives with his life partner and their children in their own home. He sells handmade bricks in an area close to his rural home. He already has many clients since the bricks he sells are of high quality and are a good price. Furthermore, the service that Miguel provides is unbeatable. He always greets his clientele with a smile on his face; he is characterized by kindness. Miguel Agnel is a man dedicated to his business, always ready to work for what he wants. For him it's important to put his heart into his work to achieve success and that is how came to ask INTEGRAL for a loan which will allow him to buy the raw material to make bricks like clay, mud, white adobe. Miguel Angel is confident that this will give his family a fulfilling life.

loans.use: to buy clay, mud, and white adobe.

loans.name: Perfecto Wellington

texts.es:
Perfecto Wellington tiene 53 años de edad, vive en unión libre junto a su esposa y sus 3 hijos de 25, 22 y 14 años de edad en el Cantón Pueblo Viejo perteneciente a Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. UNIDO SOMOS  se encuentra ubicada en el recinto El Marañón por la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo,  esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol.

Perfecto se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol. Compra sus productos en Comercial  Agro insumos Karlita y los vende en el comercial Castillo.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, arroz,fréjol  y comprar semillas, insumos, urea, fertilizantes, insumos agrícolas para antener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es poder comprar maquinaria para poder ahorrase en el alquiler de la misma para poder trabajar el terreno.

Le gusta practicar el deporte y escuchar música.
texts.en:
Perfecto Wellington is 53 years old, and lives with this common-law wife and their 3 children aged 25, 22, and 14 years old in Cantón Pueblo Viejo which is in Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

The members of V.R.C. UNIDO SOMOS are located in El Marañón by Parroquia Puerto Pechiche which is in Cantón Pueblo Viejo. This service point does short-season agricultural work, growing corn, rice, and beans. 

Perfecto grows corn, rice, and beans. He buys his products from Karlita Agricultural Supply and sells them at the Castillo Market.  

He is asking for a loan to plant corn, rice, and beans and to buy seeds, supplies, urea, fertilizer, and agricultural inputs to create good growing conditions. The support of the loan will help him financially meet his needs. He faces challenges like pests, illnesses, and changing weather. His dream is to be able to buy equipment to save on rent and to use in the fields. 

He likes to play sports and listen to music.

loans.use: to plant corn, rice, beans and to buy seeds, supplies, urea, fertilizer, and agricultural inputs.

loans.name: Marciana

texts.es:
La Señora Marciana está casada con el Señor Celso, el cual se dedica a la vidriería, tienen 2 hijos, 1 D. ellos ya está casado, y el otro es independiente ya mayor D. edad.
Ella tiene una lavandería familiar en donD. todos trabajan y ayudan, Don Celso, su marido, la ayuda en la entrega D. las ropas limpias y planchadas que la la Señora Marciana con sus hijas lavan y planchan. En cuanto a su clientela comenta que tiene clientes D. grandes empresas, a los cuales le cobra en forma mensual por los servicios realizados, por lo que ya tiene un ingreso mensual asegurado.
Ella ha demostrado ser una persona muy trabajadora y responsable con sus compromisos. Una D. sus metas es seguir creciendo D. forma gradual con su negocio, para que el día D. mañana no solo ayuD. a su familia, sino también a los demás generando puestos D. empleo.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. una seca ropas industrial, lo cual le será D. muchísima ayuda en su trabajo. Está muy contenta con la oportunidad que le da la Fundación.
texts.en:
Marciana is married to Celso, whose profession is glasswork.  They have two sons, one of whom is already married, while the other is an independent adult.

She runs a family laundromat where everyone works and helps out.  Celso, her husband, helps her return the clean, ironed clothes that Marciana and her daughters clean and iron.  In terms of clientele, she has customers from big businesses whom she charges monthly for services rendered, which assures her a monthly income.

She has proven to be a very hardworking person who keeps her commitments.  One of her goals is to keep her business growing gradually so that in the future she will help not only her family, but others by creating jobs.  

She is asking for a loan to buy an industrial clothes dryer, which will be very helpful to her in her work.  She is very happy to have this opportunity from the Fundación Paraguaya.

loans.use: to buy a clothes dryer to use in her laundromat

loans.name: Ana Vilma

texts.es: Ana Vilma de cuarenta y ocho años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus cuatro hijos. Ella posee una panadería muy conocida en la localidad donde vive, pues el pan que prepara Ana tiene un sabor inigualable siempre está recién horneado, es de excelente calidad  y lo vende a un precio accesible, la demanda ha aumentado cada vez mas y Ana Vilma ya está dispuesta a ver crecer su negocio y como toda mujer emprendedora y llena de buenas decisiones le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina por mayor, azúcar, bandejas entre otros a fin de obtener los ricos pastelitos, semita, torta alemana entre otros mas. Ana Vilma tiene la esperanza que con su duro trabajo lograra darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ana Vilma is 48 years old and lives with her life partner and their four children. She owns a bakery which is well-known in the area where she lives, since the bread that Ana prepares has a unique taste, is fresh baked, and is of an excellent quality, and she sells it at a reasonable price. Demand has increased and Ana Vilma is ready to expand her business and since she is an enterprising woman and full of good ideas she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to allow her to buy wholesale flour, sugar, trays and other things in order to make the delicious pastries, sweet bread, german cake and other baked goods. Ana Vilma has hope that through her hard work she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale flour, sugar, and trays.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en: Martha is a hardworking 47-year-old business lady. She is married and blessed with three children. For the last year, she has been engaging in dairy farming in order to provide for her family. Previously she used to sell shoes. In the next five years, she wants to have doubled her herd of cows. Her dream is to be a large scale farmer of dairy cattle. She is requesting a loan of 30,000 Kenyan shillings to buy a cow. Thanks to Faulu Kenya, she is now financially literate.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Ana Yensi

texts.es: Ana Yensi de cuarenta y dos años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Ella posee una tortillería en su  misma casa,que se situa dentro de una zona semiurbana, es muy conocida en la localidad pues prepara las tortillas más ricas y tiene el servicio más rápido, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela ya que su trabajo es de buena calidad y a un buen precio; Ana Yensi es una mujer muy trabajadora con muchas metas por delante, para ella el que trabaja con valentía y perseverancia llega al éxito en un futuro, ella quiere ver crecer su negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar una plancha nueva, dado que la que posee se encuentra en malas condiciones y maíz por mayor así podrá satisfacer siempre la necesidades de sus clientes. Ana Yensi tiene la confianza que de esta manera podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Ana Yensi is forty-two years old, lives with her life partner, and children.  She owns a tortilla shop in her home located in a semi urban area. She is well known in her area since she makes the best tasting tortillas and offers the fastest service.  Lately, she has gained many clients since she works efficiently and has good prices.  Ana Yensi is a hardworking woman with many goals for the future. She believes those who work without fear and preserverance will succeed in the future. She wants to see her business grow and is requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy a new griddle since the one she owns is in poor condition and wholesale maiz to satisfy her customers needs. Ana Yensi has the confidence that this will allow her to have financial security for her home.

loans.use: new griddle and wholesale maiz.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria has been selling clothes for the last six years in Makueni town. She is 54 years old and married to Ezekias. They have five children.

She was introduced to KADET by a friend who is also a KADET client. This will be her first loan of KES 30,000. She intends to use the loan to add to her stock of trousers, blouses, skirts and sweaters.

In the future, Victoria hopes to expand her business and venture into small-scale farming.

loans.use: To add to her stock of trousers, blouses, skirts and sweaters

loans.name: Jacinto Inocente

texts.es:
Jacinto Inocente tiene 32 años de edad, vive en unión libre junto a su esposa y sus hijos de 11 y 7 años de edad en el Cantón Pueblo Viejo perteneciente a Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. UNIDO SOMOS  se encuentra ubicada en el recinto El Marañón por la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo,  esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol.

Jacinto se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol. Compra sus productos en Comercial  Agro insumos Karlita y los vende en el comercial Castillo.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, arroz, fréjol y comprar  semillas,insumos agrícolas, fertilizantes, urea, abonos para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos para los posterior venderlos a un buen precio.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es incrementar el negocio, comprarse una finca y maquinaria para poder producir más.

Le gusta practicar el deporte y escuchar música.
texts.en:
Jacinto Inocente is 32 years old and lives with his common-law wife and their children of 11 and 7 years old in Cantón Pueblo Viejo which is in Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

The members of V.R.C. UNIDO SOMOS are located in El Marañón by Parroquia Puerto Pechiche which is in Cantón Pueblo Viejo. This service point does short-season agricultural work and grows corn, rice, and beans.

Jacinto grows corn, rice, and beans. He buys his products from Karlita Agricultural Supply and sells them at Castillo market. 

He is asking for a loan to play corn, rice, and beans and to buy seeds, agricultural products, fertilizer, urea, and manure to keep his crops in good condition to later resell at a good price. The support of the loans will help him financially meet his needs. He faces challenges like pests, illnesses, and the changing weather. His dream is to expand the business, buy a farm and equipment to allow him to grow more. 

He likes to play sports and listen to music.

loans.use: to plant corn, rice, and beans and to buy seeds, agricultural products, fertilizer, urea, and manure.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es: Graciela D. sesenta y tres años D. edad vive con su compañero D. vida. Ella posee una tienda en su hogar donD. venD. productos D. primera necesidad, su tienda es muy famosa en la localidad pues Graciela siempre tiene lo que las personas necesitan, venD. productos D. excelente calidad a un precio realmente accesible, ella ofrece un servicio único pues siempre está a disposición del cliente; Graciela a pesar D. ser una mujer D. avanzada edad siempre esta activa llena D. energía en el trabajo, ella piensa que hay que soñar y esforzarse en nuestra labor  para saber que hay más allá D. nuestros sueños. Una D. sus metas es que crezca el negocio y quiere empezar por surtirlo con mas producto es por eso que le solicita INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, huevos, golosinas, productos instantáneos, bebidas entre otros que aún no posee. Graciela tiene fe que su esfuerzo le dará la oportunidad D. darle a su familia una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en: Graciela is 63 years old and lives with her partner. She has a store in her home where she sells basic products. Her store is very well-known in the area because Graciela always has what people need. She sells products of excellent quality at an accessible price. She offers a unique service because she is always ready to tend to her customers. Though Graciela is an older woman, she is always active and full of energy in her work. She believes that we must dream and work hard in our daily labors so that we can know that there is something that is even more than our dreams. One of her goals is for her business to grow and she wants to start by stocking it with more products. This is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy basic grains, eggs, sweets, instant food products, soft drinks, and other things that she doesn’t already have. Graciela has faith that her effort will give her the opportunity to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, eggs, sweets, instant food products, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: María Elva

texts.es: María Elva vive con su compañero D. vida y sus hijos. Ella posee una tienda en el lugar D. su residencia donD. venD. todo tipo D. productos D. primera necesidad, churros, pan, galletas, jugos entre otros, se ha hecho D. mucha clientela últimamente pues ella siempre tiene lo que la gente necesita a precios realmente accesibles además María les ofrece un servicio excelente pues su carisma y amabilidad la impulsan a recibir a su clientela con gran alegría, María Elva piensa que si somos dueños D. nuestro destino, somos dueños D. nuestra felicidad; el aumento D. la demanda en la tienda ha impulsado a María para hacer crecer el negocio, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar, granos básicos, golosinas, bebidas, pan, medicinas al por mayor a fin D. obtenerlos a precios bajos para generar mayores ganancias. María Elva tiene confianza que D. esta forma lograra llevar seguridad económica a su hogar y una mejor vida para su familia.
texts.en: María Elva lives with her partner and their children. She has a store in her house where she sells all kinds of basic products, such as chips, bread, cookies, and juices, among other things. She has acquired many new customers lately because she always has what people need at accessible prices. Also, María offers them excellent service. Because her charisma and friendliness, she tends to her customers joyfully. María Elva thinks that if we are the owners of our destiny, then we are the owners of our happiness. The increase in demand at her store has motivated María to make her business grow. So, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that would allow her to buy basic grains, sweets, soft drinks, bread, and medicines at wholesale price so that she can generate greater earnings. María Ela has confidence that in this way she will be able to achieve economic security in her home and a better life for her family.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, sweets, soft drinks, bread, and medicines.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is a hardworking 47-year-old businessman. He is married and blessed with four children between 9 and 15 years old who go to school. For the last 29 years, he has been engaged in gas welding to make a living. He wants in the next five years to have opened up another shop. His dream is to expand his business and serve more clients. He is requesting a loan of 60,000 Kenyan shillings to buy gauge for welding. Thanks to Faulu Kenya, he is now able to access a credit facility easily.

loans.use: to buy gauge for welding

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy printing papers and revision text books

loans.name: Margot

texts.es: Margot vive con su compañero D. vida y sus hijos. Ella posee un puesto D. comida en su residencia y es muy conocida por todo el lugar ya que prepara diferentes platillos en el desayuno y almuerzo como rellenos, pollo, carnes, sopas y otros, todos muy exquisitos con un sabor inigualable además el lugar D. preparación es muy higiénico y los precios muy accesibles a los clientes; Margot es una mujer muy emprendedora siempre está dispuesta a ganarse el pan D. cada día es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar carnes, embutidos, lácteos, verduras, granos básicos, bebidas y más a fin D. satisfacer el incremento D. la demanda D. los últimos días y no perder oportunidad para hacer venta. Margot tiene la esperanza que D. esta manera con trabajo duro y dedicación le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Margo lives with her partner and her children. She has a small restaurant in her house and is well-known in the whole area because she prepares different foods for breakfast and lunch, such as rellenos, chicken, meats, soups, and other things, all exquisite and with an unmatchable flavor. Also, the prep area is very hygienic and the prices are accessible for the customers. Margot is a very enterprising woman and is always willing to earn her living. This is why she requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy meats, lunch meats, dairy products, vegetables, basic grains, soft drinks, and other things to satisfy the growth in demand of the last few days and not lose the opportunity to make sales. Margo hopes that in this way, and with hard work and dedication, she will be able to give her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy meats, lunch meats, dairy products, vegetables, basic grains, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy curtains and bed sheets

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Mario Luis

texts.es: Mario es un hombre de 37 años que vive en Malambo, área metropolitana de Barranquilla. Con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de 14 y 15 años. Allí tiene un taller de ebanistería, producto de su experiencia cuando fue empleado en una carpintería durante 10 años. Desde hace 5 años indicó su propia aventura de negocio en el marco de su experiencia y fabricando cada una de sus herramientas de trabajo poco a poco, e hizo trueques con muebles de su producción para obtener las más nuevas. En su negocio fabrica juegos de salas, multimuebles, puertas, y cocinas a la comunidad donde vive y en otras, además de tener clientes empresariales quienes le suministran los materiales y el ofrece sus servicios de fabricación. Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, pues desea invertir en materias primas e insumos en mayor volumen, como selladores, madera, puntillas, gomas, y una máquina sinfín,  porque su capital de trabajo no es suficiente para logra su potencial crecimiento; Comprando de contado y en volumen ganaría descuentos y sería más competitivo en la venta de sus productos.
texts.en:
Mario is a 37 year old man who lives in Malambo, in the Barranquilla metro area, with his spouse and two sons of 14 and 15. He has a cabinetmaking workshop there, which came out of his experience working in a carpentry shop for 10 years. For the past 5 years he has run his own business venture, building on his experience, and has made each one of his work tools little by little and bartered his furniture for the newest tools. At his business, he makes living room sets, entertainment centers, doors, and kitchen counters in his own community and in others. He also takes commissions from clients who provide him the materials while he provides the labor. 

This loan is the first financing he's taken out with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo [Kiva field partner]. He hopes to invest in a more primary materials and inputs, such as wood stains, wood, moulding, glue, and a table saw, as his current stock is insufficient to reach his potential growth. 
Buying periodically and in large quantities would get him discounts and make him more competitive in marketing his products.

loans.use: to invest in a more primary materials, such as wood stains, wood, moulding, glue, and a table saw.

loans.name: María Jenoveba

texts.es: María Jenoveba de sesenta y siete años de edad vive con su nieta. Ella posee una tienda en su hogar, donde vende todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad como arroz, frijoles, huevos, pan y otros, el producto que María comercia es de muy buena calidad y es por eso que la gente busca su negocio, además que siempre encuentran lo que necesitan a buenos precios y el servicio es excelente; se levanta desde muy temprano a atender el negocio, ella piensa que al que madruga Dios le ayuda y con esa fe y ganas de trabajar todos los días lucha por ganarse un futuro mejor, con alegría para ella y su familia, todo esto la ha impulsado a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar golosinas, granos básicos, lácteos, embutidos, pan, producto instantáneo, bebidas entre otros que demandan sus cliente y ella a la fecha no ha logrado comprar por falta de dinero. María Jenoveba tiene confianza que si sigue a este paso su negocio crecerá y lograra darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: María Jenoveba is 67 years old and lives with her granddaughter. She has a store in her home where she sells all kinds of staples such as rice, beans, eggs, bread and the like. The products Maria sells are of very good quality which is why people flock to her store. Besides, the service is excellent and people always find what they need at a good price. Maria gets up very early to take care of her business. She believes that "al que madruga Dios le ayuda" ["God helps those who get up early"]. With this firm belief and the will to work hard every day, she is determined to make her future better. She is happy to do this for both herself and her family. This has prompted her to ask INTEGRAL for a loan to buy candy, bulk grains, dairy products, cold-meats, bread, instant products, beverages and other much sought-after products which to date she has been unable to purchase for lack of money.  María Jenoveba is confidant that if she keeps it up, her business will grow and she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy candy, bulk grains, dairy products, cold-cuts, instant products and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy carrots, onions, tomatoes and bananas

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is 30 years old and a married woman with eight children. All of her children are in school. She has a business selling charcoal in Buluk branch in Juba, South Sudan. She has been in this business for three years.

Joyce requested this loan through BRAC South Sudan with the hopes of expanding her business. She says that she will use the extra income from this loan to pay for her children to go to school.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal to sell

loans.name: Silvia Margarita

texts.es: Silvia Margarita de cincuenta y seis años de edad, habita en su casa con su esposo José y su hijo. Silvia es una mujer trabajadora que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado poner una pequeña tortillería en su hogar de residencia. Ya tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse a este negocio ya que gracias a su carisma y buen servicio las personas cada día la prefieren más. Además cuenta con la ventaja de que es la única persona que vende tortillas en la zona donde habita. Silvia es de las mujeres que no les gusta estar sin hacer nada. Para ella lo más importante es su trabajo y su familia. Ya que del trabajo depende el bienestar de la familia. Últimamente ha estado pensando en la posibilidad de aumentar la oferta de sus deliciosas tortillas ya que  su sueño es mejorar su situación económica y la de su familia. A partir de todo esto ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar los principales insumos (maíz, agua, leña, gas propano)  para la elaboración de sus deliciosas tortillas. De esta manera espera tener la oportunidad de acceder a una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Silvia Margarita is 56 and lives in her home with her husband, José, and her son.  Silvia is a very hard-working woman, and through her hard work, she has managed to start a small tortilla-making business in her home.  She has had this business for a long time since thanks to her charisma and good service, people prefer her business more every day.  She also has the advantage of being the only person that sells tortillas in the area where she lives.  Silvia is a woman who doesn’t like not to be doing anything.  For her, the most important things are work and her family, since her family’s well-being depends on her work.  Lately, she has thought about the possibility of increasing the sales of her delicious tortillas since her dream is to improve her family’s economic situation.  To do this, she has decided to request a loan from Integral to buy the main supplies (corn, water, firewood, and propane gas) to make her delicious tortillas.  In this way, she hopes to have the opportunity to achieve a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, propane gas, etc.

loans.name: Felista

texts.en: Felista is a hardworking and God-fearing 43-year-old business lady. She is married and is blessed with three children. Since the year 2010 she has been engaged in dairy farming in order to meet the needs of her family. She wants in the next 5 years to have increased her herd of cattle. She is requesting for a loan of 50000 Kenyan shillings to buy a cow. Thanks to Faulu Kenya, she has been able to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: David

texts.en: David is an aggressive and active 47-year-old business man. He is married and is blessed with 3 children who are going to school. For the last one year, he has been rearing dairy animals and poultry so as to make a living. He wants in the next 5 years to be supplying milk wholesale.   He is requesting for a loan of 20000 Kenyan shillings to buy poultry and animal feed. Thanks to Faulu Kenya he is now able to save on a monthly basis.

loans.use: to buy poultry and animal feed

loans.name: Jeriuth

texts.en: Jeriuth is a 36-year-old hardworking business woman. She is single and is blessed with 2 children. For the last 3 years she has been operating a retail shop to meet the needs of her family. Previously she was employed as a secretary.  In the next 5 years she wants to open up a supermarket. She is requesting for a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shilling to buy flour, rice and (mobile phone) airtime to sell.  Thanks to Faulu Kenya, she is now able to access credit facility.

loans.use: To buy  flour, rice and airtime

loans.name: Maria  Alicia

texts.es: María Alicia tiene su negocio que es una pulpería, inicio vendiendo frutas y verduras luego con la crianza de pollo inicio su propio capital y estableció su pulpería que tiene dos años de tenerla. El objetivo del préstamo es para la compra de granos básicos, carnes, pollos, golosinas, detergentes, papel higiénicos y sopas. María sueña con lograr convertir su pulpería en una distribuidora.
texts.en: María Alicia has her own business, which is a grocery store.  She started by selling fruits and vegetables and then started raising chickens.  She started with her own capital and established a grocery store, which she has had for two years.  The objective of this loan is to buy basic grains, meats, chickens, candy, detergents, toilet paper, and soups.  María’s dream is to turn her grocery store into a distributor.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, meat, chicken, candy, detergetns, toilet paper, and soup.

loans.name: Juana Antonia

texts.es: Juana Antonia de 41 años de edad, habita en su propia casa ubicada en zona urbana, con su esposo Ramón de 40 años y sus 2 hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando. Juana se dedica  a la venta de ropa y sandalias para dama. Es una mujer muy trabajadora la cual hace todo por su familia. Para ella los días de vacaciones no existen ya que no pierde oportunidad ni tiempo para trabajar. Desde ya hace varios años que posee este negocio y gracias a Dios, empeño y creatividad en los negocios ha logrado mantenerlo activo hasta el momento. Cada día los clientes la prefieren más ya que ella siempre está un paso delante de la competencia. Siempre busca la forma de mantener lo más nuevo en el mundo de la moda en cuanto a ropa y sandalias. Todo esto ha hecho que Juana tome la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de variedad de prendas de vestir, de tal modo que los cliente puedan encontrar todo lo que buscan y cada día sus clientela se vea aumentada. Con el crédito piensa comprar variedad de prendas de vestir para dama ya que es la que más se vende tales como: variedad de sandalias, blusas, faldas, pantalones, ropa interior, y de más artículos que a los clientes les parezca atractivos. Con todo esto espera que su situación económica y la de su familia se vean mejoradas.
texts.en: Juana Antonia is 41 and lives in her own home, which is located in an urban area.  She lives with her husband, Ramón, who is 40, and her 2 children, who go to school.  Juana sells women’s clothing and sandals.  She is very hard-working and does everything for her family.  Vacation days don’t exist for her because she doesn’t want to lose the opportunity or time to work.  She has had this business for several years, and thanks to God and her effort and creativity in business, she has succeeded in keeping in active.  Every day her customers prefer her more, and she is always a step ahead of the competition.  She is always looking for a way to stock the newest styles in clothing and sandals.  All of this has made Juana decide to request a loan from Integral to invest in her business and the purchase of a variety of clothes.  That way, her customers can find everything that they are looking for, and she can increase her clientele.  With this loan, she is planning to buy women’s clothing, since that is what she sells the most of, including:  sandals, blouses, skirts, pants, underwear, and other items that her customers will like.  She hopes that by doing this, her and her family’s economic situation will improve.

loans.use: to buy a variety of sandals, blouses, skirts, pants, and underwear

loans.name: Primavera Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras denominado Primavera es del Chaco, todas ellas son vecinas y amigas de esa parte del país. Actualmente se encuentran en el cuarto ciclo, con un número de integrantes de 14. Ellas comentan que desean generar mayores ingresos para sus familias, pero además de eso les gustaría seguir creciendo en lo personal. Cuentan que todas trabajan de forma activa, cumpliendo con sus obligaciones de forma responsable.
La señora Dolly se dedica a la venta de perfumes, comenta que hace un buen tiempo que se dedica a esto, por lo que ya tiene una amplia experiencia, además de eso comenta que ya tiene una cantidad de clientes y clientas bien definidas, pues ellos siempre le hacen pedidos de las fragancias que desean. Uno de sus mas anhelados proyectos es tener un local donde pueda vender los perfumes que trae y de esa forma atraer a más clientes y consecuentemente tener mayores ingresos.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de perfumes, fragancias, tanto para hombres, como para mujeres, para que de esa forma pueda cumplir con los pedidos que tiene. Está muy agradecida con la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le da, pues de obtener el crédito ñe será de mucha ayuda en su micro empresa.
texts.en:
The Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras [Business Women's Group], known as Primavera, is in the Chaco and all its members are neighbors and friends from this part of the country. Currently, they're on their fourth group loan with 14 applicants. They tell us that they hope to generate higher incomes for their families, but more so than that they would like to keep up their personal growth. They say that they are all active workers who meet their obligations responsibly. 

Dolly sells perfumes and says that she's been doing this for a while now and so has ample experience. More than that, she says that she already has a lot of customers, some regulars, who frequently make orders for various fragrances of their liking. One of the projects she most looks forward to is having a location where she can sell her perfumes and attract more customers and, consequently, higher revenues. She is requesting this loan to buy perfumes and fragrances, for both men and women, so that she can fill the orders she has received. She is very grateful to the Fundación [La Fundación Paraguay; Kiva field partner] for the opportunity this gives her, as this loan will be a great help to her microbusiness.

loans.use: to buy perfumes and fragrances for sale.

loans.name: María De Los Ángeles

texts.es: María de Los Ángeles de sesenta años de edad, reside en su casa con sus tres hijas de 17, 19 y 21 años de edad. María ha trabajado toda su vida para sacar adelante a sus tres hijas que se encuentran estudiando y ella es el único soporte con lo que cuentan. María sueña con ver a sus hijas convertidas en grades profesionales y esto es la razón por la cual ella trabaja duramente día con día. Ella posee un molino de nixtamal en el cual muchas personas solicitan su servicio para moler deferentes tipos de productos tales como: maíz, arroz, frijoles, etc. Además posee un pequeño chalet en el cual vende productos de primera necesidad. María es una mujer ejemplar ya que a pesar de su edad sigue trabajando duramente para sacar adelante a su familia. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito para invertir en sus negocios ya que son sus principales fuentes de ingresos y no quiere que la competencia le gane la clientela que con tanto empeño ha logrado establecer. Su deseo es surtir su chalet con productos de primera necesidad como: azúcar, arroz, frijoles, aceite, etc. y seguir dándole mantenimiento a su molino de tal forma que las personas se vayan satisfechas una vez solicite sus servicios. Confía en Dios que logrará su objetivo y en un futuro con la ayuda de Dios y de INTEGRAL mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en: María de Los Ángeles is 70 and lives in her home with her 3 daughters, who are 17, 19, and 21.  María has worked all of her life to take good care of her daughters since they are in school, and she is the only support that they have.  María dreams about seeing her daughters become important professionals, and that is the reason she works so hard day after day.  She has a mill, and many people request her services of milling different products like:  corn, rice, beans, etc.  She also has a small chalet where she sells basic goods.  María is an exemplary woman, and in spite of her age, she keeps working hard to take care of her family.  She has decided to request this loan to invest in her business since she doesn’t want her competition to gain her clientele that she has worked so hard to establish.  Her dream is to supply her chalet with basic goods like:  sugar, rice, beans, oil, etc., and to continue maintaining her mill so people will be satisfied once they request her services.  She is confident that God will let her achieve her goals, and in the future, with the help of God and Integral, she will improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy:  sugar, rice, beans, oil, etc., and to continue maintaining her mill.

loans.name: Daouda

texts.fr: Monsieur Daouda  habite au Sénégal. Il est  marié et âgé de 38 ans.  Il est enseignant dans la localité ou il vit.  Il a choisi sa profession par amour du métier mais aussi par nécessité  dans le souci de se procurer des revenus pour subvenir a ses besoins personnels. Tout son plaisir consiste à former les jeunes élèves et les aider a affronter les difficultés de la vie. Daouda est un  nouveau  marié qui sollicite un crédit de 300 000 frs. L’objet du prêt est l’achat d’un lit et  d’une coiffeuse en vue d’aménager sa chambre a coucher pour préparer l’arrivée de sa femme a rejoindre le domicile conjugal. Le financement lui permettra de réaliser son projet et d’améliorer son cadre de vie.
texts.en: Daouda lives in Senegal. He is married and 38 years old. He is a teacher in the town where he lives. He chose his profession out of love for teaching but also because he needed to earn money to provide for his personal needs. He gets great pleasure from teaching young pupils and helping them to face life's difficulties; Daouda is a newly-married man who is requesting a loan of 300,000 francs. The purpose of the loan is to purchase a bed and a dressing table for his bedrom in preparation for the arrival of his wife in the conjugal home. The loan will allow him to fulfil this project and improve his living space.

loans.use: to buy a bed and dressing table for his bedroom

loans.name: Ana Deysi

texts.es: Ana Deysi de 47 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el cual lo integra su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos. Para Ana su familia es  lo más importante y es por lo que trabaja duramente día a día. Ella posee un bazar en el cual vende diversidad de artículos como: zíperes, agujas, hilos, tijeras, etc. y además tiene una mini librería en el mismo lugar donde provee a alumnos de escuelas o centro de estudios cercanos. Desea poder surtir su negocio para que los clientes la prefieran más y siempre soliciten sus productos. Cuenta con la ventaja de que no tiene mayor competencia dentro de la zona por lo que su negocio es rentable y quiere explotar al máximo dicha ventaja. Ha decidido agrandar su negocio y para eso solicita este  crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar variedad de: papelería, útiles, hilos, agujas, tijeras, zíperes, etc. para mantener todo lo necesario dentro de su negocio y poder lograr atraer a más clientes de tal manera que permitan mejorar los ingresos y por consecuencia su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Ana Deysi is 47 and lives in her own home with her family, which is made up of her husband and 2 children.  For Ana, her family is the most important thing, and they are the reason she works hard day after day.  She has a bazaar where she sells diverse items like:  zippers, needles, thread, scissors, etc.  She also has a small bookstore where she serves school children and the nearby student centers.  She hopes to be able to stock her business so customers prefer her more and always request her products.  She has the advantage of not having big competition in the area where her business is.  This is why she is requesting a loan from Integral to buy a variety of products like:  paper, notions, thread, needles, scissors, and zippers to maintain everything her business needs and to be able to attract more customers.  In that way, she can improve her income and therefore the quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of paper, notions, thread, needles, zippers, etc.

loans.name: Certerine

texts.en:
Certerine is 40 years old with five children, all of whom are in school. She is a widow. She has a hotel service business in Buluk, Juba, South Sudan. She has been in this business for four years.

She requested this loan through BRAC South Sudan with the hopes of expanding her business by purchasing chairs and tables for her hotel. She says that the extra income from this loan she will use it for building a house in future.

loans.use: to purchase chairs and tables for her hotel.

loans.name: Felipe Rafael

texts.es: Felipe Rafael brinda el servicio de sastrería que está ubicada en su vivienda desde hace diez años. Lo aprendió desde muy joven en un taller y fue así que trabajo mucho tiempo en esta actividad fue con el paso del tiempo que logro independizarse y con esfuerzo propio logro comprar sus máquina. El crédito es para la compra de hilos, telas, tijeras, agujas. Uno de sus sueños es mejorar su vivienda y lograr proporcionar más empleo con su negocio.
texts.en: Felipe Rafael offers a sewing service that has been located in his home for 10 years.  He learned how to sew when he was very young in a sewing shop and has worked a long time doing this work.  As time passed, he managed to become independent, through his hard work, he was able to buy his machine.  He will use this credit to buy thread, fabric, scissors, and needles.  One of his dreams it to make improvements to his home and to be able to hire more employees for his business.

loans.use: to buy thread, fabric, scissors, and needles.

loans.name: Santos Gabriela

texts.es: Santos Gabriela tiene 52 años se dedica a la venta de productos varios, como envases de vidrio, cuajada y gallina. Hace más de 20 años que se dedica a esta actividad, con el negocio de los envases de vidrio inicio con la ayuda de su esposo y un hijo que trabajaba lavando botellas gracias a su hijo comenzaron este negocio, también vende gallinas que las ofrece en mercad. El financiamiento es para la compra de gallina, cuajadas y envases de vidrio.
texts.en: Santos Gabriela is 52 and sells various products like glass containers, cuajada (curd), and chickens.  She has done this work for more than 20 years.  She started her glass container business with her husband's and son’s help.  Her son worked washing bottles.  Thanks to him, they started this business and also sell chickens in the market.  She will use the financing to buy chickens, cuajada, and glass containers.

loans.use: to buy chickens, cuajada (curd), and glass containers

loans.name: Ana Elizabeth

texts.es: Ana Elizabeth  D. 37 años D. edad, habita en su casa con su grupo familiar integrado por su madre, esposo y tres hijos. Ana es muy trabajadora y responsable quien se ha convertido en la principal proveedora económica dentro D. su hogar. Se dedica a la venta D. calzado, ropa y cosméticos.  Tiene muchos años D. dedicarse al mundo D. los negocios y gracias a su carisma cada vez los clientes son más. Su sueño es hacer crecer su negocio, para así poder tener la oportunidad D. aspirar a una mejor calidad D. vida. Para esto ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL con el objetivo D. comprar mercadería D. actualidad para su negocio, D. tal manera que los clientes siempre encuentren lo que buscan . Con el crédito quiere comprar variedad D. prendas D. vestir (calzado, blusas, vestidos, faldas, short, ropa interior, cosméticos, etc.) para estar un paso adelante D. la competencia. D. tal manera que en un futuro no lejano pueda lograr su sueño.
texts.en: Ana Elizabeth is 37 and lives in her home with her family, which is maD. up of her mother, husband, and 3 children.  Ana is very hard-working and has become the main economic provider for her home.  She sells shoes, clothing, and cosmetics.  She has many years of experience in the world of business, and thanks to her charisma, she gains more customers every day.  Her dream is to see her business grow so she can have the opportunity to aspire to a better quality of life.  This is why she has decided to request a loan from Integral with the objective of buying current merchandise for her business so her customers can always find what they are looking for.  With this loan, she will buy clothing (shoes, blouses, dresses, skirts, shorts, underwear, cosmetics, etc.) to be a step ahead of the competition.  In this way she will be able to achieve her dream in the not-so-distant future.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing (shoes, blouses, dresses, skirts, shorts, underwear, cosmetics, etc.)

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es: Sandra Elizabeth, resiD. en casa propia ubicada en zona muy humilD., con su grupo familiar el cual lo conforma su esposo D. 27 años y su hija que se encuentra estudiando. Sandra se dedica a la venta D. ropa como: faldas, vestidos, pantalones, short, ropa interior, etc. Esta actividad la realiza D. manera ambulante en las principales comunidades D. la zona cercada a donD. ella habita. Es una persona trabajadora y confiable, muchas personas solicitan sus prendas D. vestir ya que ella siempre trata D. mantenerse al día con la moda, además ofrece precios accesibles e incluso da facilidades D. pago a fin D. poder hacer negocio. Ha tomado la decisión D. solicitar este préstamo para comprar variedad D. prendas D. vestir como: faldas, ropa interior, camisas, pantalones, blusas, etc. para atraer a más clientes y poder aumentar su nivel D. ventas que le permitan mejorar sus ingresos y como consecuencia su nivel D. vida y la D. su familia.
texts.en: Sandra Elizabeth lives in her own home in a very humble area with her family, which is maD. up of her husband, who is 27, and her daughter, who goes to school.  Sandra sells clothing like:  skirts, dresses, pants, shorts, underwear, etc.  She does this by traveling to the main communities in the neighboring areas where she lives.  She is a very hard-working and trustworthy person.  Many people request clothing from her since she always tries to have the latest fashions.  She also offers affordable prices and ease of payment.  She has decided to request a loan to buy a variety of clothing like skirts, underwear, shirts, pants, blouses, etc., to attract more customers and to be able to expand her level of sales so she can improve her income and consequently the quality of life for her and her family

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing like skirts, underwear, shirts, pants, blouses, etc.

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es: Pedro Antonio de 45 años de edad,  reside en su casa junto con su esposa de 38 años y su hija de 13 años de edad. Pedro se dedica a la venta de huevos y ropa. El negocio lo realiza por medio de un Pick up en el cual se traslada  a las diferentes comunidades cercanas a la zona donde el habita, vendiendo por menor e incluso a tiendas que compran ya por cientos de huevos. Además su esposa posee un negocio en el mercado central en donde también comercializa huevos y ropa. En ocasiones Pedro opta por quedarse en el negocio con su esposa para realizar juntos la venta, esto en las fechas de mayor actividad comercial. Hasta el momento el negocio va floreciendo pero para Pedro que es un hombre emprendedor no se quiere quedar solo con eso. Él es muy arriesgado por lo que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a integral para comprar mayor cantidad de huevos y ropa para tener suficiente y ampliar la ruta que hace en su pick up. De esta manera espera mejorar su vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Pedro Antonio is 45 and lives in his home with his wife, who is 38, and their daughter, who is 13.  Pedro makes a living by selling eggs and clothing.  He uses his pickup truck to travel to various nearby communities in the area where he lives.  He sells retail and also to stores that purchase orders of hundreds of eggs.  His wife also has a business in the central market where she sells eggs and clothing.  Sometimes, Pedro chooses to stay at his wife’s business to sell with her on days where there is more activity in the market.  His business has flourished, but for Pedro, who is an enterprising man, he doesn’t want to leave it at that.  He has decided to request a loan from Integral to buy a larger quantity of eggs and clothing to have enough to expand the route he makes in his pickup.  This way he will be able to improve his and his family’s life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of eggs and clothing.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is a hardworking business woman. She is married and is blessed with 2 children. For the last 4 years she has been running a school so as to make ends meet.  Previously she was employed as a teacher. Her dream is to grow economically in her business. For the next 5 years she wants her school to become a full-fledged school with a high population of pupils. She is requesting for a loan 60,000 Kenyan shillings to buy desks and stationery.  Thanks to Faulu Kenya, she has been empowered economically and financially.

loans.use: To buy desks and stationery

loans.name: Nelson Enrique

texts.es: Nelson enrique se dedica a vender el servicio de barbería tiene más de doce años en esta actividad. Inicio esta actividad muy joven y fue con el ´paso del tiempo que él decide establecer su propio negocio, pues tiene cuatro hijos entre las edades de cuatro, seis, diez y trece años y les enseña a ganarse la vida muy honradamente es por eso que solicita el crédito para la compra de tijeras, talco, navajas, cepillos, peines y máquinas de afeitar.
texts.en: Nelson Enrique provides barber services and he has had this activity for more than 12 years. He started out this activity when he was very young and with the passage of time he decided to set up his own business. He has four children, aged four, six, ten, and thirteen and he is teaching them how to earn an honest living. He requests a loan to purchase scissors, talc, blades, brushes, combs, and electric razors.

loans.use: to purchase scissors, talc, blades, brushes, combs, and electric razors.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco de 31 años de edad, reside en casa propia junto a su querida familia la cual está integrada por su esposa de 28 años de edad y sus dos hijos. Francisco se dedica al comercio y a la agricultura. Es un hombre emprendedor que no descansa para poder sacar adelante a su familia. Su principal fuente de ingresos es el comercio que realiza a través de la compra y venta de cereales (maíz, arroz, frijoles, etc.) en las principales comunidades cercanas a su comunidad. Él posee un pick up con el cual realiza esta actividad. Gracias a su dedicación y pasión por el trabajo ha logrado establecer buena clientela, muchas personas lo buscan con frecuencia ya que el siempre está dispuesto a realizar su trabajo y además ofrece precios accesibles.  Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito para comprar cereales tales como: maíz, arroz, frijoles, etc. para tener suficiente oferta y siempre poder dejar satisfechos a los clientes. Además de esta manera espera lograr mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Francisco is 31 years old and he lives in his own house together with his beloved family, composed of his 28-year old wife and their two children. Francisco is a merchant and an agriculturist. He is an enterprising man who is tireless in providing for his family. His primary source of income is commerce, consisting of the buying and selling of cereal grains (corn, rice, beans, etc.) in the major and nearby communities. He has a pick-up truck with which he carries out his business. It is thanks to his dedication and his passion that he is been able to achieve a stable clientele. Many people look for him frequently because he is always ready to work and also because he offer accessible prices. He has made the decision of requesting a loan to purchase cereal grains such as: corn, rice, beans, etc., in order to have enough inventory and to be able to always keep his clients satisfied. This is how he hopes to improve the quality of his life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase cereal grains such as corn, rice, and beans.

loans.name: Mujeres Activas Group

texts.es:
El comité Mujeres Activas se formó con la unión D. varias vecinas D. la ciudad D. Mariano Roque Alonso. Actualmente está integrado por 20 mujeres, las cuales formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz D. realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo y trabajo en equipo. Ellas comentan que se unieron por las ganas D. progreso que tienen, ya que desean seguir adelante y darle un mejor estilo D. vida a sus familias.
La Señora Maria es una D. las integrantes del comité, ella es madre soltera D. un hijo, se dedica al comercio. Tiene una despensa hace mucho tiempo, donD. venD. todo tipo D. comestibles, por lo que ya tiene una clientela bien definida, dice que su negocio le genera buenos ingresos por lo que le gustaría seguir con el. Uno D. sus sueños es poder ampliar su local, y D. esa forma forma tener más capacidad, con lo cual podrá aumentar sus ingresos y ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. comestibles, bebidas, hortalizas y otros para el abastecimiento D. su negocio. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le da, ya que D. obtener el crédito le será D. mucha ayuda en sus proyectos.
texts.en:
The Comité Mujeres Activas [Active Women's Committee] was created by the coming together of several neighbors in the city of Mariano Roque Alonso. Currently it is comprised of 20 women, who make up a strongly unified group capable of achieving things together that strengthen their camaraderie. They note that they came together out of the desire for progress they share, and so hope to get ahead.  

Maria is a member of the group and is the single mother of one. She runs a retail business and has had a small store for some time, so she already has a regular clientele. She says that her business generates a good revenue and so she'd like to keep it going. One of her dreams is to enlarge her store so as to increase her capacity and increase her income. She is taking out this loan to buy food products, beverages, produce, and more to stock her store. She thanks the Fundación [La Fundación Paraguaya; Kiva field partner] for the opportunity this gives her, as this loan will be a great help with her plans.

loans.use: to buy food products, beverages, produce, and more to stock her store.

loans.name: Sara Nohemy

texts.es: Sara Nohemy D. 37 años D. edad, habita en casa propia con su querida familia conformada por su esposo y su querida hija. Sara se dedica a los negocios, ella posee un pequeño chalet en el cual venD. diversidad D. golosinas y bebidas. Su negocio está ubicado en uno D. los centros escolares D. la zona donD. ella habita. Por lo tanto es un lugar muy estratégico para el tipo D. negocio que ella posee ya que los estudiantes con frecuencia demandan sus deliciosas bebidas y golosinas. Además se ha ganado la confianza D. ellos y cada día le prefieren más por ser una mujer carismática, respetuosa y sobre todo trabajadora. Ha tomado la decisión D. solicitar este credito para surtir su negocio D. tal manera que sus clientes encuentren variedad D. productos cuando se acerquen a su chalet. Con el crédito piensa comprar variedad D. dulces, galletas, bombones, churritos, bebidas, incluso espera poder incluir la venta D. antojitos, como enchiladas, pupusas, refrescos para los jovenes.
